name: Hairdresser's Invisible Oil Frizz Reducing Hair Oil
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Oil
about: What it is: A clear oil that vanishes into hair, leaving a frizz-free, feather-soft feel and a trace of shine while helping to provide heat and UV protection...Hair Type: Medium and Thick..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Concerns:.- Dryness.- Frizz.- Heat Protection..Key Benefits:.- Shine.- Reduces Frizz.- Heat Protection..Formulation: Oil..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Featherlight 6-Oil Blend: Provides conditioning, moisture, nourishment, softening, and smoothing..- UV Filters: Help protect hair against the drying effects of the sun...Ingredient Callouts: Free of sulfates SLS and SLES, parabens, phthalates, and mineral oil. This product is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This clear, lightweight blend of six oils absorbs quickly into hair to help hydrate, soften, silken, tame, defrizz, detangle. Itu2019s formulated with UV filters to protect from the drying effects of the sun and against breakage and heat styling. It also works well with dry, damaged, and color-treated hair...Fragrance Description: Take in this luxe yet light scent of fruit and tropical florals, anchored with rich musk and woodsy notes.
ingredients: -Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, and Macadamia Integrifolia Seed Oil: Condition, soften, and add shine..-UV Filters: Help protect hair against the drying effects of the sun....Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Isododecane, Dimethiconol, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Extract, Gardenia Tahitensis (Tiare) Flower Extract, Bis-Cetearyl Amodimethicone, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Butyl Methoxydibenzoylmethane, Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Ethylhexyl Salicylate, Squalane, Tocopherol, Linalool, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, Fragrance....Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Work sparingly into damp hair before heat styling, or smooth through dry hair for a shiny finish..-Start small but add more when necessary..-Pro tip: If your hair needs bonus moisture, add a few drops into your conditioner.

So, I was looking for something that would tame frizz and nourish my dryish hair.  Honestly, I gravitated towards the bright bottle; I loooove orange.  Given that it was almost 50 dollars and from what I thought was a reputable brand, in store at Sephora, I figured it would be a win.    Perhaps it is billed as 'invisible oil' because no one can tell that I attempted to style my hair except for me, when I touch my hair and feel how greasy it is.    I have tried it with my flat iron, with my diffuser, and with air-drying.  I have tried to apply it to both damp hair and dry, sometimes both, and under no circumstances has this product worked for my hair type.  It is super slimy and just sits on top of my hair.  It's even rather difficult to wash off my hands.  The return window has actually closed now, and my hair has looked like garbage for two months because I keep trying to make this stuff work.  A lot of people seem to be really happy with this product, but I would say if you are wavy 2b like me, perhaps go for the trial size.

reviews.review_text: This stuff is absolutely amazing. They say not for thin hair but thatu2019s false.   Fine hair?  Step 1. Spray the u00ab Hairdresseru2019s Invisible Oil Heat & UV Protective Primer u00bb All over your hair but concentrate more on your ends. (Not too much)  Step 2. Squeeze 1 pump of the u00ab Hairdresseru2019s Invisible Oil u00bb in your hands depending on the thickness of your hair. Rub your hands very good before dabbing your ends... Dab ends only!!!    Iu2019m a blond with very fine hair. My hair is mid back length and I only use one pump.

I have curly hair and normally use silicone free products. I didnu2019t read the ingredients but Iu2019m pretty sure it has silicones because it made my hair feel waxy. Would probably be a good product to use for when I decide to flat iron my hair

reviews.review_text: I'm sorry, I really wanted to like this.  It came highly recommended from the sales girl.  It was expensive but was willing to try it.  Maybe I don't know how to use it?  Can't imagine it's a huge learning curve but just didn't work out for my hair.  First use, hair was very oily, maybe I used too much.  Second try, used less, hair frizzy and looked over processed.  My expectation: Wash hair, condition hair, put on hair after, get smooth curls.  What happened: Wash hair, condition hair, put on hair after, frizz and over processed look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried many hair oils and had pretty much given up because I didn't like the residue they left, made my hair look super greasy, or didn't do anything to tame dryness or frizz at all.  I had heard good things about bumble and bumble so I splurged on the full size of this oil, and it is my absolute favourite oil ever. The full size bottle lasts me just under a year using it every time I wash my hair (2-3x per week) and whenever my hair feels dry I finger comb a pump or two through my dry hair to bring it back to life.   I didn't realize how well it was taming my fly aways/frizz and hydrating my hair until I stopped using it. I have long hair (lower back length), and it's super wavy (borderline curls but not quite) but not thick at all and this has never, ever, made my hair greasy.   My hair is pretty dry, but like any oil obviously don't apply close to your roots. I work in the majority on the bottoms of my hair, then if I have frizz up top I use the leftover oil on my hands to *lightly* smooth it down by running my fingers through it.  I've been buying it religiously for three years now and I have no plans on stopping. Price is a little much but considering how long it lasts me, it's a good investment.

reviews.review_text: So good! This is the product I recommend to EVERYONE when they ask me why my hair looks so good. I have super long hair (like down to my waist long), and I use only 1-2 pumps to smooth it out.  I can usually extend my washes by 1-2 days using this product which has been great for hair growth.  I even have the small size in my purse to fix flyaways on the go.  I also use this product before I curl my hair to hold the curl much better (without the product my curls will fall within a few hours - this extends it for an all-day look). From the feedback from my friends, the product works with most hair types.    Can you tell that I really really love this hair oil?  Highly recommended!

reviews.review_title: Good addition to my collection of hair oils
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good addition to my collection of hair oils.  I always put hair oils on my hair after flat ironing to take away the somewhat parched look I get (especially on the ends) from years of heat styling.  This hair oil stood up to my HG one, and I might even grow to love it just as much or better.  I got a VERY sleek look with this oil which is what I aim for.  I love poker straight hair with a great sheen.  My hair has grown less sleek from heat damage, but this hair oil reminded me of the good old days.  Plus, I thought my ends laid flatter instead of being a dried/frayed mess.  One does have to use caution with this oil, though.  I found that a lot comes out of the bottle.  Even when I was careful to control the amount, this oil is very oil-y/slick.  I was really afraid that I used too much, even though I am well versed in hair oils.  I ended up using the right amount, but I'm concerned that in the future I will over-do it.  Those with thin or fine hair should be extra careful.  I initially even felt like my hair was too coated by the oil/silicones.  I didn't necessarily mind the feel, but I was concerned about it getting greasy moving forward.  I'm just hoping that I don't wind up with residue.  Another thing that I wasn't pleased about was that this was very hard to wash off my hands.  My hands were very greasy after I used this, and I had to soap them up at least three times.  It's an annoyance, but it also made me wonder if I was distributing the oil throughout my hair - or just rubbing it all over my hands.  All turned out well in the end.    So, this product is a little quirky but I think overall it is worth it.  My hair is thick, so it can handle oils well.  However, is this isn't the case for you I would start by using a very small amount, and maybe even using in conjunction with your usual hair oil until you get used to this one.  Also worth noting: the price point is a little high.

reviews.review_text: Used this product for years and actually liked it until I realized after recent research the first ingredient is silicone. What a bummer. Especially since this product is $50! As someone who is on a natural hair journey I now read the labels and make sure I know whatu2019s going in my hair. Silicone makes the hair appear healthy and shinny but over time creates a barrier over your hair shaft and makes itu2019s harder for your hair to absorb moisturizer which ruins it. Just read labels ladies. Most of the products in this line contains silicone by the way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My hair: Bleached white under pastel lavender that I re-dye when it washes out. It had already been messed with before bleaching it so it was pretty u201cfriedu201d. Iu2019ve been using good conditioners and being careful not to break the hairs when theyu2019re wet (I blow-dry), but there was still nothing I could do to stop these tons of frizzy-fried hairs from popping up all over.  I got this as a sample and I wanted to try it because what it says it does is what I wanted (hair that can be made to appear sleek when it naturally wouldnu2019t tend to do that). Iu2019ve tried other oil-type products that didnu2019t work for me (even if I only used a little), so I was not expecting this to work for me. The cashier really warned me not to use too much. I barely used enough to get some oil on the tips of 2 fingers, then spread it around to the other fingers and ran it through just the ends of my hair. I thought Iu2019d need to grab more for the rest of my hair once or twice but nope. Just that first bit was enough for everything. I just kept combing it through further upwards by hand. I was surprised by how the oil made me be able to comb through my wet hair so easily without breaking the hairs. Even detangler hasnu2019t done nearly as well. Another thing I didnu2019t expect was that using this seemed to cut my drying time in half. I love that it protects the hair because the last thing Iu2019d want is to damage it more. After I was all done I did notice a lot fewer frizzy-fried hairs, at least 75 percent less than with other things Iu2019ve tried. The overall look was a lot more sleek or u201cdoneu201d than with anything else Iu2019ve tried. It was nice to not have to feel like a frizzy-fried mess for once after going through the trouble of doing all I could do. Doing my hair felt overall a lot easier too. Iu2019m definitely going to continue using this stuff and no longer need to be searching for a product that works for me.

reviews.review_title: Fine, but better options for soft shine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product works fine, but if you are just looking for shine and softness there are better products for less money.   I use a separate hair cream so I can't speak to how it performs with heat, but I used it as a finishing oil and found it too heavy for my hair.  This would probably be more suitable for thicker, coarser hair.  Compared to my usual Alterna Haircare bamboo smooth kendi oil dry mist, it was just too heavy and silicone feeling. It is almost double the price per ml as well, so I will stick with the kendi oil dry mist for adding shine and softness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is simply amazing!! my hair are just perfect after using this product and usually they are really dry and not healthy. This product is literally my little secret.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is amazing! Iu2019ve always had messy and tangled hair. I also had damaged hair therefore I had to cut it. Ever since my hair get very puffy and frizzy. I bought this during the vib sale and i use one pump after I shower or one pump on dry hair and I brush it and my hair is no longer frizzy and itu2019s so soft and it has a nice healthy shine to it. Definitely pleased!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just used this for the first time today and I absolutely love it. I have wavy hair that I straighten frequently. My hair was instantly shiny, soft and I could actually run my fingers thru my hair ...for once lol.  The smaller amount goes a long way. This is amazing and I highly recommend this for any hair type. Just donu2019t use too much if you have fine hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a sample. I already have a holy grail hair oil (not sold at Sephora) but this was great to try. I have long wavy/curly hair, I try to limit hot styling tools and products. I used this on damp hair, blow dried with a diffuser attachment and it looked great, thats all I needed. You also don't need much, like a dime size for me. It's unfortunate I dropped the sample on the floor and the little glass tube it came in broke (all over the place, boooo) so I didn't get to use it more. It's more expensive than my regular oil so likely on't buy full size. My friend (also wavy hair) received the same sample and liked it as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I applied this to my wet hair before blow drying.  This oil didn't leave my hair as soft as I was hoping.  The ingredients seem good so I was very disappointed with the outcome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love the way this makes my hair feel and smell! I only apply it to my (processed) ends and it works wonders. I also use the shampoo and conditioner, but alternate with another salon brand. Only wash my hair 2-3 times/ week.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a couple of samples of this product and loved it. I use a lot of heat on my hair and since I started lightening it again my hair has definitely paid the price, but this makes it feel so soft again and even though my hair can be naturally oily this doesn't weight it down or make it look greasy. I'll be buying a large bottle of this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I brought this product on a adventure-trek where I had no hair styling equipment. I washed my hair, let it dry naturally and put the oil on. Got compliments on my beatifull shiny hair the entire time. I absolutely love this product. To top it off, the smell is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a lifesaver.. seriously. I have very damaged, dry, thick, wavy, frizzy, unruly color-treated hair. I've been searching for years to find a styling product that would not weigh my hair down and give it the just left the salon look. Everything else I've tried, including Moroccan oil just weighed my hair down and didn't make it any healthier.  I am absolutely in love with this oil.  I put this in my hair before blowdrying and not only did it make my hair gorgeously silky and smooth, but it cut my drying time in half! I usually have to flat iron my hair to tame it, but not with this product. Also, it smells divine, not overly heavy and perfumed. It's very lightweight also.  This is one of the best hair products i've ever tried - highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've been torturing my hair with bleach for years and was looking for something to manage the damage while it grows out. I have very fine hair so I just use 1.5 pumps on the ends of my hair while damp, then one more pump after drying to finish. Just a little bit goes a long way. This stuff really does eliminate frizziness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This smells great but just works okay (it's no match for baby hair wisps). It didn't make my hair look oil after applying but I wouldn't have taken the sample if I had known the primary ingredient is dimethicone.

reviews.review_title: 11/10 my dad even noticed a difference in my hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I put this in my damp hair after my leave in conditioner, before my heat protectant when I blow dry my hair. This smooths out my hair (not in a greasy way) and makes it look much more luscious and vibrant. Iu2019ve been using this in combination with the Verb hair mask, and I have seen a big difference. Even my dad told me that my hair looked really nice and thick! I bought this hair oil at an Estee Lauder store at the outlet mall; I think the amount that I paid was fair but $40 is a little too pricey.
This is great for my thirsty curls. I pair it with BB curl when wet and leave to dry, itu2019s great. I also use the primer from time to time to help with frizz. Also works great for blowouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this, live in a dry climate, my husband and i both used this and he loves it more than me, he has really really short hair, army style cut but he used it on his short beard and hair. It really tames frizzy hair and makes the hair feel soft.  Its really pricey so i have to think twice before buying full size. Hence 4 stars

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered a sample of this and OMG I'm in love with it!! Best hair oil I've ever used! Smells great, makes hair super shiny without being greasy. I want a big bottle of that stuff!

reviews.review_title: Good product - a bit less so for oily hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Product works well for calming strays. Have to be careful not to put too much for oily hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff! just scored two of them for $5.99! It always leaves my hair so soft and sleek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I've always had ithcy scalp issues when I use oils, so my hair gets very dry, I tried this on a whim the other day and was blown away by the results its day three: No Itch, Still clean and had kept its shape well. Soimpressed by this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have bleached blonde hair, and it's naturally black. Even though I have it colored professionally, we run into tangles and damage. I originally got this as a sample, and I fell in love with it and bought the larger bottle right away! Other moisture products made my hair slimy, sticky, or heavy. But since my hair gets really temperamental at the ends, I have to use something so it's smooth enough to comb. This B

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have really THICK, COARSE, WAVY hair and as Iu2019ve aged (43 years old) itu2019s become dry and dull (the joys of aging...LOL). Iu2019ve been using Bumble & Bumble for years and Iu2019ve moved onto other shampoos & conditioners, but this is the one product of theirs that Iu2019ll never give up. I have short, colored hair and use just 2 drops of the oil (alittle goes a long, long way). This oil is lightweight and truly invisible. It makes my hair shiny and gives it a feeling of healthiness....even after I use my flat iron.  Itu2019s pricey, but well worth the money!!

reviews.review_title: Great for Straight and Fine Hair
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Use after you get out of the shower and if you have straight and fine hair (like me) I wouldn't suggest using it on your scalp and roots. Leaves hair softer than any hair mask or conditioner could ever. A lot of the 1 star ratings say that it left their hair looking greasy. I have never experienced this personally even though my hair gets greasy very quickly. I mainly use it on the ends and the middle of my hair. Went from ginger to blonde and haven't had any breakage because of this oil. 100% recommend for use on wet hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great buy...Non sticky an smell good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a lot of positive reviews, but I found it to be no better, and perhaps slightly worse, than the one I get from the drug store at a third of the price. Yes, it makes your hair soft, but mine was still frizzy and the fly aways remained unruly. I quickly returned this. Perhaps, I was expecting too much based on the product claims and positive reviews, but this product does not deliver!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This was great for my daughter's naturally curly hair! It is very moisturizing, but not too heavy. It has a nice scent and it doesn't take much to do the job.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: Love this oil!  I have extremely dry and thick hair and live in a very dry climate so this oil is my favorite.  A small amount goes a long way so the bottle lasts a long time. I use it once my hair is dry and can use it anytime I am touching up my hair.

The best. It literally gives my hair life. My hair shines so much with this and I love it. After dying my hair from black to blonde my hair dried out bad and got really damaged. Now I can finally get it to this with this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is great, especially with bleached hair, it really helps the dryness

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ok product, need quite a bit to get result I wanted, returned the item, may be works better for others
My go to oil for my dry damaged frizzy hair! Literally a little goes a long ways and it's great for my dry ends! And it doesn't leave my hair super oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: not for fine hair. made my hair really greasy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: lightweight, not greasy, nice bit of shine
Best smelling oil, makes my hair smell so good. Don't put too much on the ends! Run the extra through the rest of your hair and no more flyaways

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way. With just two or three pumps, this oil helps tame fly-aways and create a sleek shine and softness to my coarse, thick hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect first step for my hair! This oil detangles my long hair... just 2 drops raked through each side after towel drying allows me to comb it out. My other 2 products layer over and after blow drying, my hair is shiny, smooth, and wavy. Not weighed down or too slick/heavy like other oils. Tames the frizz!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thick, wavy/curly hair that tends to frizz and dry out. This product delivers hydration and frizz control without leaving a greasy residue. I use a nickel-to-quarter sized amount while my hair is damp. The smell is nice, but very subtle. I would rate this 4.5 stars if I could for the price: $40 for the full size is expensive!
This is great for finishing a look, too. I hate to use hairspray and I find this product gives me a nice tousled look. It also has a faint but lovely smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you dye your hair regularly then suck it up and buy it buttercup! A little goes a long way, got this as a sample first, and it repairs your hair as it smoothes; plus works great with coconut oil overnight as a deep conditioner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You won't need to use a lot to see instant improvement!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny. This is not too oily (read: dry oil), smells great and works well into the hair for a shine/moisturized finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing product! Took me a while to finally commit and buy the large size but I am so glad I did. My hair has never felt better - it has controlled my frizz and (wild) baby hairs, makes my hair feel incredibly soft, does not make my hair look or feel greasy and allows me to comfortably air-dry my hair. Totally recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for dry tips on the days you don't shower. Not too oily or heavy on thin hair, and you start noticing it visibility repairing hair in about a week! Holy Grail for sure !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it though I'm a fan of Bumble

I absolutely LOVE this! I have fairly thick hair & I only need two pumps for my hair to be silky smooth. More than two pumps makes my hair oily. Also, I put the product in the ends first. If I put the bulk of the product on my roots, then it gets super oily. Again, I love this stuff!

reviews.review_title: O B S E S S E D
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To say I'm obsessed with this oil is probably an understatement. I've tried other products and brands and they have left my hair feeling dirty, but a small pump of the B

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The hype is true. This oil makes my hair so soft, and doesn't weigh it down or make it greasy. I have fine 2b/2c hair but a lot of it and it frizzes like crazy. I use a little bit of this, like one pump, after I wash my hair and it works like a dream. Highly Highly recommend!!

I literally cannot survive without this. I have wavy hair that can frizz on a dime without this oil. It smells feminine and soft and works miracles on my frizz. I have been using this for quite awhile and I only need to replenish once a year with 1x daily use.
Just purchased second bottle after first one lasted a couple years! Good oil for dry hair and ends. Usually slatter it on
this product is worth every penny and it'll last over a year. this is the go to serum when everything else fails.

reviews.review_title: amazing miracle worker for curly hair
reviews.review_text: I have used a lot of products in an attempt to tame my sometimes frizzy curls (Moroccan oil, coconut oil, leave-in conditioners... you name it), and this product takes the cake! Leaves my hair soft, sleek, and bouncy when I use it on damp hair after showering at night (I also use a pump or two in the morning before I head out). I tend to straighten my bangs, and this has helped leave my hair straighter and less frizzier than before in humid weather. This is a must-have for every curly-haired woman!
SMELLS AMAZING. Not too heavy

This has significantly helped my frizz and gives my hair the natural wave it so wants. A little goes a long way. If using to much it can leave the hair looking greasy. This doesn't solve all my frizz issues but it's a step in the right direction. My hair is definitely looking healthy
Got the travel size on a whim and I loved it. Will be going back to purchase a full size. It smells great and really light product. Doesn't weigh down hair.

reviews.review_title: Amazing for natural african american hair!!
reviews.review_text: Believe me when I say this is the ONLY product that has worked on my 4c natural dry, coarse, dense, thick, frizz prone, damaged hair. I've been transitioning from relaxed to natural for two years and struggling to find products that keep my hair from reverting to a frizzy unmanageable puff after straightening. This oil, combined with the invisible oil primer worked, and lasted for days...not hours! After trying literally 9 products within two weeks, this was the clear winner. Thanks for the how-to video Sephora for recommending these products!!
So far it has done nothing for my hair other than make it greasy but I'm going to keep playing with it to see if I can get it to do what I want it to do mostly because I don't want to waste $40
This is a fantastic hair oil and it lasted so long! I use 2-3 pumps after towel drying my hair and blow dry it. My hair feels very silky and not greasy at all! Great for using in the winter.
if you have thin straight hair... this product is not for you. The worst i've ever tried for my hair. It made it extremely greasy and nothing more than that.

A little goes a long way--I learned this the hard way.  I also don't apply to the roots as my hair tends to be a bit on the oily side closer to the roots.  It did help smooth out my hair and I noticed a huge difference with just one use on the ends of my hair.  I recommend you just apply a tiny amount to your ends for your desired look.

this stuff is amazing. I received a sample of this stuff, and decided to try it today during my weekly extra long self care routine (involves some Boscia products, sephora face masks, Drunk Elephant, and purple Joico conditioner). As I let the oil sit for the 20 minutes directed, I was hesitant. It was definitely greasy and messy, but once I had it in my hair and up in a bun it wasn't an issue. After washing it out, my hair felt amazing!!! I have been coloring my hair for the past 5 months, and I have been feeling the effects of it. Purple shampoo/conditioner is notorious for not being very moisturizing, and this got the job done without leaving a greasy mess. Will be incorporating into my routine.

I got this over a year and a half ago and recently bought a backup because I love it so much. I have thick curly hair that is so frizzy and untameable that when I first tried this I instantly loved it. I keeps my hair soft and not frizzy an it doesn't react as badly to the humidity as it used to. I totally recommend it!
This is the only product that works for my thick hair. I use it when flat ironing my hair as well as getting those wispy hairs under control.  A little bit goes a long way!

If it can keep my hair frizz free, believe me it's going to work on your hair too.   I use it on my damp hair... 5 pumps (because I'm always too much). And I even went further with my test, I let my hair air dry... and didn't have any frizz !!!!   I don't know it's the combination of my new hair routine, but I don't want to find out... I love the smell, and the look it left my air dried hair behind (shiny, and FRIZZ-FREE).

reviews.review_title: Fine Hair || Oily Roots || Dry Ends
reviews.review_text: I have fine hair oily roots and very dry ends. I tend to avoid using too many products in my hair as they tend to weigh it down. Having such dry ends I need something to keep it from looking like a hot mess. This is the first oil that I've tried that does exactly what I want it to do; make my hair look shiny and healthy. Most oils tend to creep up the shaft of my hair, causing my hair to look super greasy. Instantly became a holy grail product!
A little goes a long way!

Best product ever, i have coloured my hair in a lighter Shade and it dried my hair a lot, took me forever to brush it, using 2 pumps of the oil it slides right through. It also leaves the hair soft and shiny, def healthier !   Love it!

I went through a whole bottle over 6  months because I really wanted to like it. But I don't. It's too heavy for use as a hair oil on the ends of long hair (I have waist-length medium-thickness hair that is not textured). The smell is annoying. It's ok as an oil treatment, but plain old coconut oil is better.

I wanted to love this since I love Bumble and Bumble products but I just don't. A little bit goes a long way and I know it's an oil but it's wayyy too oily for me. I would use a drop smaller than a dime and my hair still looked greasy when I used it to tame my flyaway hairs. The invisible primer works way better at smoothing and taming my hair.
I have very frizzy, curly hair and this really worked great with my hair! It lasted all day and significantly hydrated my hair.
Very disappointed with this.  It dried out my hair.  Didn't feel moisturized at all and I have very fine thin hair.

Love this product very very very much! It's great to use every day, even if you don't wash your hair every day. Use a little on dry hair and it keeps your hair vital and fresh. A little goes a long way. All the invisible oil products are great but this is the mainstay, if you must choose just one. A staple in my bag.

LOVE this! I have 3B/3C hair that is naturally black, but has been dyed to an ash blonde. I desperately needed something that would provide shine to hair that was looking dried out, but not weigh it down with greasiness. A little goes a long way, definitely worth the investment!

reviews.review_title: Love the smell but doesn't do anything for my hair
reviews.review_text: I have dry, color-treated hair that is in need of a hair serum after each washing. I bought this because of all the great reviews.  I am more than half the bottle through and still can't learn to love it. The smell is amazing, but it doesn't really do anything to my hair. I tried using a lot of product, but my hair just gets greasy. I've definitely tried better hair serums.
I love this. My is brittle from bleaching it too much and this helps with it so much. I especially love using this right after a shower or when my hair is damp.

I have thick, coarse, wavy hair. I blow dry my hair once or twice a week. Since using this I can tell a huge difference in my hair as far as the frizz factor goes. It gives just the right amount of shine without weighing down my hair and it smells great. I would definitely try this product out. Fantastic heat protectant, anti frizz oil!!!

In the past, I would never use any hair oils or leave-in conditioners. It wasn't until I bleached my hair that I decided to purchase this product to help repair the damage. After using this oil, my hairdresser said that my hair looked healthier than before I bleached it- And I agree!

I have very long wavy hair, and the ends can get a little dry and frizzy. This product instantly calms it down. When I brush my hair without this, it gets puffy. When I brush my hair with it, it smoothes it. I have had the 3.4 oz bottle for a long time and a little goes a long way. This product is my ride or die. It also works really well when I straighten my hair, but I rarely do that. I 10/10 recommend it to anyone. It's definitely worth the splurge.
Once the small size I bought runs out I will be buying the bigger one!

reviews.review_title: Does not work for my type oh hair
reviews.review_text: I have amazing natural curls. My hair is in-between and mixed. I can brush it straight or leave it in ringlets. Bumble and Bumble does not work on my hair. After using the product for over a month along with their shampoo and conditioner it has made my hair more dry. It does not moisturizer the scalp and roots of the hair nor my tips. I now use it as my hair oil tamer when I want something quick with not too much shine. But once it runs out I will not be buying again.

I was so hesitant to spend this kind of money on a tiny bottle of oil, because I was previously using just a $12 bottle of argan oil, but one bottle has lasted me well over a year. My hair is shoulder length but it is very curly and very dry. I can use this as a leave-in treatment on my hair when it's wet, whether I am going to air dry it (following it up with a curl cream, usually B&b) or as heat protection when I'm going to blow dry and straighten it (I use B&b straight blow dry cream). I also use a tiny dab when my hair is dry to make it shiny and help get rid of frizz. This has almost the same effect as the Invisible Oil primer spray, which I also love, but this one is probably more versatile if you want more bang for your buck.

I had been using Moroccan Argon Oil on my hair for the past three years, and I was hesitant to try something different. But, since I was running out of my Moroccan oil and needed to get something else, I decided to give this invisible oil a shot and I'm SO happy with it! I only used 1 and a half pumps (so not very much!) and my hair reacted well to it when I was drying it. Even better though, my hair did not get nearly as greasy as fast as it typically does with the moroccan oil! I highly recommend this product!
I love to use this when I go to bed with my hair wet. I put a few drops into the ends of my hair and wake up with silky smooth hair. It does not make my hair oily or greasy. It is worth the price!

It's expensive but this stuff WORKS my bleach blonde fried hair soaks it up and loves it I use it before styling and after and it completely smoothed out split ends and frizziness. Drastic difference after I apply ...

3 drops of this stuff is enough for my whole head! awesome for my thin/frizzy/static-prone hair.    I accidentally let a drop hit my hardwood floors though and thought I wiped it up. nope. it's absorbed into the wax coat and is hella slippery now. be careful.

I absolutely adore this product! I received mine in a bumble and bumble voxbox and I couldn't be in love more. I just bleached my hair and the feeling you get after is absolutely disgusting, after one use of this oil my hair immediately felt soft and smooth !! I was shocked by how much I love this product and I have to admit I'll buy it again soon!
Highly recommend! Lightweight, absorbed quick, detangled, softened, and added shine. Has a soft pleasant sent. Doesn't make your hair look greasy. Seriously all you could ask for.

I have naturally fine curly hair which is usually weighed down with oils.. but this was AMAZING for my hair. I used a dime sized amount and it helped with the frizz and made my hair look very healthy and shiny.  I received this product complimentary from Influenster for review purposes.

This has got to be the best product out there. It makes my hair smell incredibly, extremely soft and silky and most of all it doesn't weigh my hair down or make it feel oily. Totally recommend it to anyone.

LOVE IT!! Ok, so I read a few reviews describing the product as oily. When I first used it I treated it like the Moroccan oil I used to buy. Moroccan oil is very thick and I would often need 5-6 pumps for my hair. Kind of a waste now that I think about it. I did that the same for this product and my hair just looked dirty oily and gross. I decreased the amount used to 2 pumps to coat my hair from root to tip - I have long thick, slightly wavy hair. The oil literally feels invisible. It's super light but you know its working because after I blow dry my hair is left silky smooth. Goodbye Moroccan Oil!

I like this oil a lot but only gave it 4 stars because of the price. I've tried tons of products over the years and my hella cheap serum (Frizz-Ease Extra Strength Six Effects + Serum) which is less than $20 works just as well, if not better, as this $50 product. This oil does smell pretty incredible though! I have really wavy/curly hair and use 2 or 3 pumps both when I blow-dry/straighten, and when I wear my hair natural. The product works great either way. It's lightweight and not at all greasy. Won't repurchase solely based on the price.

reviews.review_title: Left normal to dry hair looking extremely oily!
reviews.review_text: I color my hair blonde and it is pretty dry. I used a tiny amount of this oil and it makes my hair look greasy, oily and unwashed. Tried again with even less & only on ends, like one drop....did not make my hair soft...still oily, greasy mess. I previously used Moroccan Oil, Biosilk, etc. - they never made my hair oily or greasy. Not sure what kind of hair this would work for....I'll never touch again.

This a holy grail product for me. It help tame my dry frizzy hair and a little goes a long way all you need is literally a pea size amount for you hair. Little about my hair I have dry hair from dying it and using styling tools but I've always taking very good care of my hair but I always felt something was missing and this is it. It has made my hair so soft and controls the fizz so well. It's a must have product,
my daughter has fine but thick hair, so she gets knots that are amazingly difficult. somehow, this oil takes the knots out.

WOW! I have lightened, fine hair that's prone to a lot of frizz.  This product actually transformed my difficult hair into gorgeous, shiny, soft hair that I can't stop touching. I wish I had heeded the warning about using too much product - a common newbie mistake, I'm sure, because it feels so light and harmless. Its a small bottle but it'll go a long way!

I have medium length, wavy hair that has the tendency to get frizzy easily. This oil is lightweight and doesn't make hair look greasy or weighed down. Also, even though it is pricy (hence the 4 star), a little bit goes a long way... and it smells amazing!
Lightweight, quick absorbing oil! Does not weigh my hair down. This product will always be part of my haircare favorites.

I am a new convert. I obsessively search for hair oils that don't leave my hair feeling like an Exxon oil slick. Invisible is the perfect word. My hair feels soft, manageable, and amazing. WITH NO OILY FEEL.  I'm in love.  Best product I've tried for a #contest
This oil smoothes my hair and takes away all the frizz that I get from styling my hair with heat. I love it so much! Definitely recommend to others! #contest

So I got to test the Bab Hairdresser's Invisible Oil! the scent is light and not too overpowering. the formula felt light in my hands! WOW!! instantly felt better, with only two pumps of product! It covered my whole lower half of my hair, that really has been dry from the cold air! My hair looks soft, smooth and refreshed! I am throughly impressed. I don't feel heavy or greasy either! I tried this product from a #contest #BbInstantStyle
I used this oil to tame frizz and moisturize my color treated/hot tool hair. It smooths any frizz without weighing down and making my hair greasy. Plus it has a delicious scent. #contest

I recently tried the Bumble and Bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil and it was amazing! It was very lightweight and hydrating for my dyed hair. It made my hair softer and sleek. I even purchased the smaller size online to use! The only thing I didn't like was that it leaves an oily residue on my hand after applying to my hair. #contest

Totally meant for my hair! My hair has been colored a lot and can look really dry on some days. This thing saved the day and really lessened the frizz and gave me the shine I needed. I don't like using a lot of products on my hair because I'm trying to get it back to healthy. After using it again, I might use this daily.  With my Asian wavy hair, I think I can get away with just using this.  #contest
this primer made my hair so soft and smooth after just a few uses. truly crazy with how dry and frizzy my hair can be!

I tried this product out in Sephora, and noticed that it smelled very nice--almost fruity. The product seemed to moisturize my hair and it really helped tame any frizziness I had! I think it is at a reasonable price due to the way it transformed my hair and made it very silky. #contest

I am newly obsessed with this product! I tried it by recommendation from the lovely B&B rep I spoke with in the store and it really is all it is cracked up to be! I feel as though my hair is completely different after using this product.  It is shinier, less knotted, stays the way i style it all day, and is good for my hair in general! I was skeptical about it being called an oil because my hair is typically oil by itself but I did not notice any increase in oil. I recommend this product!! #contest

I have curly/frizzy hair and it is very hard for me to find products that keep the frizz down and add shine.  A lot of products make my hair greasy but this oil doesn't do that at all.  I am so happy with how shiny and soft it makes my hair.  I definitely recommend!!!!  #contest

I seriously love this. I love that I can walk into Sephora and try this before I buy it and it smells amazing!!! even my Fiance loved it. My biggest gripe is the price.....but I love it sooo I will use sparingly

I cannot brag about this product enough from the smell to the way it makes my hair feel from root to my brittle ends. It is something I have been searching for since I started coloring my hair again to keep it from looking extremely damaged. It helps give it shine and helps soften those damaged ends. #contest

Got to create a fun look with two small braids using the Bumble and bumble Hairdresseru2019s Invisible Oil! My hair instantly felt softer and silkier and it almost immediately got rid of the frizz I had from blow drying my hair that morning. #Bumbleandbumble #BbInstantStyle #contest
I love this product! My hair feels so healthy, soft, shiny and all of that is thanks to this oil! Itu00b4is very effective, delicious smell and I think good for the price.
I'm always so impressed by bumble and bumble's products and this one does not disappoint. It is lightweight, smells amazing, and is very effective! I would definitely repurchase

I tried this oil for some of the little flyaways I tend to get when wearing my hear up. It definitely helped to tame them, while at the same time being light and non-greasy. When I pumped a little too much, I just rubbed it into my hands and it didn't make them feel sticky at all!

This worked well to tame flyaways and make my hair look smoother and more put together. It also smells really great. I only gave it 3 stars because I don't see a big difference between this and a bottle of argan oil. #contest
The invisible oil is amazing! I love that it gets rid of frizzy flyaway hair and smooths dry ends

I really enjoyed this product. It adds just the right amount of soft texture to my hair without leaving it too oily or stiff. Plus it smells amazing! Just a couple drops is all you need, a little goes a long way.

This product made styling my pin-straight slippery hair a breeze. I tested it for free at Sephora through Influenster. I definitely recommend this to anyone who has trouble with having hairstyles stay in their hair. #contest
I tried this out on my thick hair and actually really liked it. It applies clear and light weight. I like that it is multipurpose and all kinds of hair types can use this #Contest

reviews.review_title: Love this oil, Not Greasy at all
reviews.review_text: I love the way this oil feels. upon hearing the word oil, i thought it would be greasy but not at all. The hairdressers's invisible oil is truly invisible because it melts into your hair upon application and it makes your hair feel smooth and silky and healthy when touch but does not look like you applied oil at all. I used it to tame flyaway and it lasted the whole day. i will definitely recommend this oil. The only thing for me is that it is EXPENSIVE but i think it will last a while since a little goes a long way. #contest

I was asked by @influenster to try one of bumble and bumble's new dry styling hair products and this is the one I chose. I have kinky, coily curls but I decided to try the products on blow dried hair. I used about a nickel size of the product and worked it from the ends up. This product left my hair shiny & manageable. I chose a sleek and sassy bun for the best style to used with this product. I love it and I will definitely use this product again. #selfie #contest
A transformative, multi-tasking hair oil Features a clear, lightweight & quick-absorbing formula Contains a luxurious blend of six oils & two extracts

I really liked the smell of Bumble and Bumble's oil. It had a light and not overwhelming scent to it. It was good in controlling some frizz and fly aways. I tried this as part of a contest with Influenster. #contest

First of all I have straight, pretty thick, long hair that is very dry at the ends..  I feel that this oil softens my hair, keeps my hair detangled for a longer time and gives it a shine (not a disturbing shine, just a soft shine) and also straightens it out a bit. Most importantly - it completely covers my dry ends! I don't know if it actually does something to heal them but they sure LOOK very fresh and strong after I've applied this oil. It also smells heavenly and not too much!  It is expensive but you only need one pump for your entire hair. I just spread it out on my palms and stroke it onto my lengths.   Great product for everyone who wants a quick routine to make their hair look fresh and healthy and smell nice! #contest
This oil is quite pricy for such a small bottle. However it is worth every penny! I love the smell of it and how it hydrates my hair.

This oil is great because I have very dry ends. I don't think it absorbs as quickly as I would like, unfortunately. However it does add the shine and hydration that I expect from it. Love that it can be used anytime my hair is feeling parched. #contest

I went to Sephora & tried this product & became obsessed with it. It left my hair smelling phenomenal & so soft, silly & shiny instantly. My hair is usually frizzy but with this bad boy, that doesn't exist anymore ! #Contest #Infuenster
I have blonde and very dry hair but this stuff makes it feel like silk!  Love it!

I only tried put this product in the store. It worked well taming my frizz down, but unfortunately my hair is too thin and lost its volume. The product is well priced (to be a Sephora hair product), packaging is great and the product itself does exactly what it claims to do. It did not smell to harsh for my sensitive nose.  Thanks Influenster for having me on the hunt to try out new products.   Additional: #Bumbleandbumble #BbInstantStyle #contest @Influenster @bumbleandbumble

I have problems with hair oil weighing down my hair. I also have relatively greasy hair, which can be accentuated by some oils, but have very frizzy hair. This oil helped everything!!! Great lightweight product that aids in styling but also is great by itself. #contest

I tried this product because I heard so much about it from Influenster, and it does wonders. I dye my hair blonde and the color treatments really dry out my hair, change the texture, and make it knot so easily. Bumble and Bumble's Hairdresser's Invisible Oil not only decreases the frizz that I get from split ends and damage, but it also helps me detangle knots. I use it after the shower on damp hair and it makes my hair so much softer and shiny! Love it! #Contest
Loved it. It left my hair soft, non frizzy and it was not tangled at all.
Love this stuff for my thick red hair. It shows what potential my hair has. Please make a travel size :)
Perfect antifrizz makes my hair neat #constest
Loving this hair product! It seems like the perfect product!
Love this oil!! It is able to go on wet or dry hair, just be careful not to much when it is wet! It smoothes and protects. Amazing product, so light and doesnt make hair feel heavy or oily.
i have oily hair and colored trated, buuut my hair is silky and the ends (tips) . i only apply on the tips and feel so smooth, i expect that doesnt make my hair more oily.

I tried this today and really liked it! I have dry hair due to coloring and processing and this was really nice for taming frizz and flyaway stray hairs, as well as adding softness and manageability to my hair. It had a really nice, light smell, not overpowering at all.

i was looking for a dupe for the moroccan oil and found this at my local Sephora! it was soo nice and it gives your hair a really nice finish. I have really dry hair and always have to put on conditioner after i wash my hair, after using this i can see a visible result of my hair being more moisturized and nourished! Recommend this to everyone u2764
Got this in 500 pt reward. My hair is fine, curly, frizzy and recently balayaged. Keeps damage to a minimum and makes my hair so soft. It's a keeper

This is a great hair oil! I love the texture and that this doesn't weigh my hair down at all. You only need a small amount, a little goes a long way! It makes my hair feel silky and really helps to tame flyaways and frizz while making my hair shiny without looking greasy! I think this makes a great overnight treatment to nourish your hair by using a few pumps right before bed. It really soaks in overnight and gives dry hair a moisture boost. Love the scent and texture of this product. It's not my FAVORITE hair oil but it definitely gets the job done and is worth trying if you're looking for a dry oil that's not too heavy/greasy. #contest
After tried his product my hair was so moisturized and perfect finished. is really easy to use and I loved that is very light. #contest

I'm making the switch to this oil!!! After years of processing my hair I haven't found a cure for the dryness and breakage until now. I used a small amount and it wasn't greasy and left no residue after being worked in. Really stopped my flyaways too! Bonus. Had a great hair day complete with maximum shine.

Let me start off by saying, I normally am super frugal and I don't like spending so much on hair products, but oh goodness, this product literally saved my hair.  After having an unfortunate experience with a very popular shampoo by a well known drugstore brand, my hair was dry, falling out, and beyond damaged. I had to cut 5 off.  That very evening I had my hair cut short, I decided that I would purchase this and start using an oil on my hair ends after every wash. I was going to take control of my damaged hair.  It's been 5 months since I bought this and it has not only restored my hair, but kept it in excellent condition. I have not even needed a trim since I started using this along with the Invisible Oil Primer.  If your hair is dry, damaged, colored, etc and you're at your wit's end, try this.  Do note that this should only be used on the mid-lengths to the end. Using it around your scalp can leave you feeling and looking oily.  I personally use less than a dime size amount of oil each application and I still almost have a full bottle. This is going to last me for ages.

I have always loved bumble and bumbles product quality. Their oil is light but packs a punch. Those fly aways don't stand a chance against this product. Does not feel greasy. I highly recommend at least going into sephora and trying this product. A little goes a very long way so the smaller size bottle should last quite sometime.

reviews.review_title: Soft, Light, and Safe for Natural Girls!
reviews.review_text: I tested this product at Sephora on my natural hair (protective style) wet and wavy braids. I was surprised how well the product took to my hair and how light it fell. The consistency is smooth to the touch and I highly recommend this product. The price is pretty good too (they offer smaller sizes if you don't want to spend $40).

Used this today and was pleasantly shocked at the results: soft, low frizz waves with no greasiness. I've used Argan oil on my hair for years, and always ran the risk of greasiness. Today was different. I'm so glad I tried it out. My one day washed hair looked like it was day two hair! #contest {I obtained a sample of this product especially to review... This is my unbiased, honest opinion.}
This product from BUMBLE AND BUMBLE is absolutely amazing. It makes my hair incredibly
I have gone to my nearest SEPHORA, because I could not wait to check these products for hair care and I was in love. I want to win this contest. Thank you influenster for sending me this campaign.
My hair is super damaged from colouring it so much that this oil makes it feel so absolutely amazing. Very little goes a long way. Deff would buy again.
I tried this product in hopes that I would love it due to all the reviews. I have really dry and frizzy hair and this product did nothing for that. It did however make it a little softer.
It works amazingly! It really makes your hair look healthier, shiny, and smoother. I would totally recommend this product. The price is fair for the quality of the product.
Tried this out for a #contest in sephora and smell is great and it seems like it works very well, would love to see if it works on wet hair! But price is high.

I tried this product when i went to sephora and out of all many items in there this caught my attention because having a dry and colored hair i want a product that will make my hair soft silky and more alive. I tried this with one pump and put it at the end of my hair and as soon i ran my fingers through my hair i knew that this product will be amazing! I love the smell aswell! #contest

What I loved about this product was how light it feels (most oils are heavy), the smell is delicious and it doesn't feel sticky at all, it felt so smooth. I would love to test it out on my wet hair and style it. What I didn't like was the price lol, but this could be so good for my fine long hair. #Contest

I tried this product in store, and I wish I had had it with me all day! It instantly smoothed my ends, and reduced the appearance of the broken baby hair frizz near my roots. I was wearing mini buns, and this oil significantly polished up my style. Best part? I barely used a drop! I would definitely consider buying this product. PS: This review was submitted for a #contest
I absolutely love this product ! It was super lightweight, did not look greasy, I still had plenty of natural movement without any frizz and it gave a nice healthy shine. #contest
I have always like bumble and bumble products, and I really like this product. It gives you moisture but no greasy or oily look. #contest

This is my go-to hair product. I use this on dry hair, wet hair, everything! I think it makes my hair look much healthier and shiny! I have pretty normal hair, kind of straight and slightly wavy, and it works great when I blow my hair out.  #contest

I went to Sephora by the prompting of @influenster app as part of a #contest. I tried this product and it truly does make my course wavy hair have total softness. Looking forward to adding the primer to my haircare regiment for tangle free hair.
Love this oil so much! It tames my frizz for my curls and adds moristure and shine!! #contest

My hair gets really frizzy especially on rainy days like today and this smoothed out my hair soooo much I would definitely recommend this product. Some of my friends that came and tested this product out also really loved it!! #contest

I love the entire hairdresser's invisible oil line. This product did not disappoint! It's great for adding a little shine when you have completed your hairstyle or if you need to smooth your hair while it's still damp before blow drying your hair!
This oil did wonders for my hair, without making it shiny or oily looking. The prize was a bit high, but this company is always worth it
I tested this product out for a contest. I loved how it completely just  rejuvenated my hair. I suffer from dray hair and this has helped a lot. I highly recommend #contest

I tried tris for a contest! And os a super hiper mega product. This oil like amazing gold. it helps my blow dry look smoother and feel softer and my curly become less frizzy and define my 2b hair. It's really good! #contest
This product is fantastic! A little goes a long way. Ive been using it when my hair is dry to smooth the ends and it's amazing the difference it makes! My hair looks so healthy and shiny!!
I went to sephora to try it for the influenster contest but i couldn't just sample it i loved it i had to bring it home .. #contest

This oil is amazing. A little goes a long way. I've used it on both damp and dry hair and like it both ways. On wet hair it helps my blow dry look smoother and feel softer. It helps my wavy hair become less frizzy. It's awesome!

I was at Sephora and tried this product. It eliminates frizz,  leaves hair soft and dosen't give you that oily pulled down feeling, it leaves hair shinny and smells amazing.  Also although it's a tad pricey you don't need much at all so it'll last you a very long time! #Contest

I ran into Sephora to find the perfect hair oil to tame my flyaways. I rode on a water ride at Disney, so my hair became very frizzy! I grabbed the Bumble and Bumble Hairdressers Invisible Oil & like a unicorn, this product made the flyaways disappear in an instant! This oil is the best on the market & I highly recommend it!!
I just tried this at my local Sephora and I'm totally in love with it  My hair feels super soft and looks super shiny  #contest

My stylist recommended this the last time I was in Sephora! I was using Super Skinny from Paul Mitchell when blow-drying and straightening, but I like this a lot better. I truly enjoy this!It's not heavy feeling, very light, and it smells really nice, a sweet kind of almondy floral scent, and my hair looks great when I use it, whether I blowdry or let it dry curly. I can't get over how light my hair feels with it, it's lighter with it on than if I use nothing at all. It's a great detangler and leaves just a little bit of shine. You do have to be careful not to use too much, I use about a pea-sized amount for my mid-length bob. If you use too much it can get greasy. Otherwise I love it! Pricey but lasts forever, would buy again.  #contest

I got to trial this recently since I had heard the announcement of this launching and I really enjoyed it! I have very kinky, curly, coily hair. I put what I thought would be a little on a few strands of hair and just put that back in my two strand twist. I was amazed that hours later my hair still felt soft and moisturizer with it! It had great slip and I was able to work it through my hair nicely. It has a beautiful scent and it was so moisturizing that I had to rub it in my hands and event they felt good from being so dry. I'd recommend this because it made my hair feel good for several hours. My hair usually drinks up anything I put in it so the fact that I could still tell the product was there was a plus!

I was first introduced to this product at an in store event last year. Since I was running out, I tried a few other comparable products this past week, I went back to this one.  I use this every day. While it's pricey, very little goes a long way. I have long fine hair, and only use a half pump. I use it when my hair is both wet or dry such as when I air dry my hair, along with when I use a hairdryer and as a thermal protectant when curling my hair. It tames my flyaways, and keeps my hair hydrated and tangle-free. It has a light scent to it, but doesn't linger. If you use a lot of it, it will definitely feel heavy and weigh down your hair losing that volume. #contest
I really loved this product. I have very thick hair and one thing that amazed me was that it smooth my hair down and tamed the frizz. I didn't have any flyaways at all. #contest
This product did wonders on my daughters hair. She has thick wavy hair. It tamed the frizz and made her hair feel oh so soft. #contest
This hair oil works really well. It tames fly always and doesn't weigh the hair down. I still prefer my marrekesh oil over this, but they are both great!!#contest
So I gave it 4 stars because of the price, otherwise this stuff really makes my hair nice and smooth! And definitely keeps my frizz under control! #contest
It is pricy but it is something you can rely on all the time.  It smells amazing and feels non greasy.

reviews.review_title: This is a miracle in a bottle
reviews.review_text: I suffer from dry, damaged, overly heated hair so my hair is damaged and dry. I have always had a lot of frizz and unruly hair. I tried this product out and I cannot believe the results that it gave me. My hair looks so much healthier in just one application. It completely tames my hair and gets rid of all the frizzies. I completely recommend this product to everyone! #contest
It feels greasy when you put it in your hands but then as I put it in my hair I noted that it became far less greasy and my hair became manageable and glossy. For sure recommend! #contest
Revolutionary. I love using this after blowing out my hair! It's hard to tame the beast which is my hair, so to find a product that can makes life so much easier! It also smells amazing!
Tried this at the store today and It made my hair soft instantly ! I wish it was a little cheaper though :( #contest

This hair oil is fantastic! it is nourishing and multitasking that instantly softens, silkens, tames, de-frizzes, and detangles all types of dry hair..  It is very lightweight and smells absolutely wonderful.  A little goes a long way and it leaves your hair moisturized, silky smooth and shiny,  without weighing it down or making it too oily. #contest #influenster

I originally received this as a free sample. I loved it so much I had to buy more. This stuff is amazing. I started using it to protect my hair from the heat of straightening. I am continuing to use it because my hair is so incredibly soft from it! It does just as it promises and more.
This was amazing! I put a bit on my ends and tamed my flyaways! It hair smell even better and shiny but didn't leave it oily. I recommend it 100% and will surely be purchasing!

I tried this in store and ended up purchasing it because I fell in love with it. It smells amazing and is lightweight but you can still tell it's moisturizing enough. I have fine hair and this didn't weigh it down. Miracle! #contest

I was surprised to see that I actually liked this, I felt as if it was greasy in my hands but then as I put it in my hair I noted that it became far less greasy and my hair became manageable and glossy. For sure recommend!
Instead of being called invisible oil- this should be called Amazing Oil. I put this on wet hair and immediately saw (and felt) a difference. Amazing for dry hair too.
I went to sephora to try it for the influenster contest but i couldn't just sample it i loved it i had to bring it home ..  #contest
Love the formula though a bit pricey. Not greasy or oily. Lightweight and has a good smell
This oil is a must have.  It is pricey but it lasts forever!  It only takes one small pump and it's good to go.  It makes your hair soft and silky.  It tames flyaways without looking oily.  #contest

Overall Bumble's invisible oil is a great buy. It's lightweight, not too greasy like more oils & doesn't have an overly intense aroma. I have big hair...yes I meant big lol so I probably use more than the average person. I strongly recommend if you're looking for a new sufficient product but it is a bit on the pricey side. Totally worth it!!

I went to Sephora to try out the Bumble & Bumble Hairdresser's Invisible Oil for my long thick hair as part of a contest. I applied it from the mid-hair shaft all the way to the ends of my air dried hair. The oil is weightless n does not feel greasy at all n it smells really good! Love this stuff!! N a little goes a long way, does not weigh my already heavy head of hair down at all, a new must-have in my haircare~ #Bumbleandbumble #BbInstantStyle #contest @Influenster @bumbleandbumble

One of my all time favorite oils. A little goes a long way and when I say that I mean it. I have thick, curly, long hair and sometimes certain products you end up using what seems to be the whole bottle but not with this. It gives shine to the hair so I would recommend using on wet hair, using too much and on dry hair could cause your hair to look greasy. It softens the hair and gives it a more manageable look. Would recommend if you want a light oil that also does the job!

I loved this product ! It qas lightweight, no strong odor, did not leave hair looking greasy or feeling oily and provided frizz control without reducing the natural movement of my hair. Hair was left feeling soft and had a very pretty natural shine. I first tried it at seohora then bought it!!! #contest

I tried this in store and like it. The brand has so many products to choose from. i have curls. I like that it feels soft to touch. smell good. A little goes a long way with this product. it adds the perfect amount of texture to my hair without leaving my hair too oily. On the plus side, it smells amazing! #contest

This product is great for my dry hair! It gives my hair life without making it look oily!

I tried out this product along with the finishing spray and ended up loving both more than I thought I would! This oil didn't feel heavy or feel like it weighed down my hair, it smells great and helped my split ends. I would definitely consider buying full sizes of this oil and the finishing spray, great products!!! #contest

I absolutely love this product. A little goes a long way and it smells so good. I normally put it on my wet hair after a shower and on dry hair to tame the frizz. Yes it's expensive but totally worth it.
I have not been a fan of the bumble and bumble line but i tried this out and i do like it. I used this and then put my hair up into a pony braid and when i took it out,, my hair was soft.
This is such a great product!! It tames my frizzy hair just love it!!
SO GREAT!! I have such horrible split ends and this helped so much! I didn't end up having to chop off all my hair with this product! So happy with the results #contest

Tried this out in store just to see the effect on frizzies hair. It's pretty light weight and doesn't leave my hair with extra gunk or feeling slimy. I've always loved Bumble and Bumble, and this product is no different! It really made my hair super soft and it smells awesome. I have very fine hair, and this didn't weigh it down like other hair oils do. My only complaint is that it is very expensive. #contest
I have curl frizzy hair so anything that makes it smooth with out weighing it down I love and this product does that and plus the smell is amazing!
Tried several products today and this was by far the most amazing!!!! Thank thank you for creating a product that supports all hair types! #contest
I love that this is nourishing without weighing my hair down. #contest

Popped into my local store to try this as part of an Influenster campaign. Silky to the touch but a little slick. Does effectively tame frizz but also weighed my hair down a little. Worth it when my hair is dry though. #contest

After walking through the drizzling rain to the mall, my curls were a bit unhappy. The re-dried with some frizz, and fly-aways. Just a bit of the Hairdresser's Invisible Oil smoothed away the frizz, and tamed my fly-away hairs back into place before we headed to dinner! #contest
This oil is light weight but stil tames frizz. It makes the hair feel healthy and smooth.

The bumble and bumble hairdresser invisible oil is awesome! I use it on my ends to help them not look so broken because I do use hot tools and I color my hair so this helps tremendously when it comes to keeping my hair healthy. #contest
This product really did wonders for my hair helped make it smooth and shiny. I used to use Moroccan oil and it would turn my hair red! This product is much better #contest

The product is great. I love how you only need a few drops and how it gives my hair such shine It is very lightweight and didn't feel extremely sticky or greasy. The scent is nice too. Great for styling texture especially with my wavy hair!
The product is great. I love how you only need a few small drops to make your hair soft and shiny. It is very lightweight and should last some time. The scent is nice too. Great for styling. #Contest

reviews.review_title: Bumble and Bumble For The Win
reviews.review_text: A Sephora consultant recommended this me when I said I was looking to fight massive frizz.  I'd say overall it is a pretty great product that lives up to most of its claims. It for sure helps to soften and add shine. My experience with reducing frizz was that it definitely works, but for people like me with a huge problem its not going to save your life, but I did not expect that.  I can't really say for protection against heat as I use other products, so to claim that is was a direct result of this would be hard. I did not see a massive difference when it came to detangling. However, the other perks of this product are enough to make that a non issue for me.  I would 100% purchase this again. Biggest downside is that it is a little pricey so I wouldn't be able to make it an everyday thing.  #contest
This oil smells great and added so much softness to my natural curls. It didn't feel heavy at all not even when i tested it in my hand. Great product.

reviews.review_title: Brought my hair back from the dead
reviews.review_text: My hair is pretty damaged from years of coloring it, but even after stopping coloring it over a year year ago, my hair still has not recovered fully. My hair is a frizzy mess all the time, no tame to it whatsoever, and it's so disheartening. Enter Hairdresser's Invisible Oil! This stuff makes me feel like I have actual hair again and not a rat's nest on my head. I use it after showering at night and also in the morning if my hair is too frizzy. Although I know my hair won't be perfect for quite some time (until I grow all of the damaged parts out, and my hair grows SO SLOW), this oil has been a life-saver and now I can't live without it.

I was brought into Sephora by Influenster and encouraged to try out the bumble and bumble products and one of the sales people and I had the absolute best time! I came in with my natural frizzy hair and she showed me how using the hairdresser's invisible oil I can eliminate frizz and create beautiful natural waves! Absolutely in love! Bought the product on the spot! The oil is weightless and does not weigh down hair at all.

Worth the money if you use less and not daily to avoid build up. #contest
