As someone who has dry damaged hair, this product is a life saver! The oil is light and doesn't wear my hair down and makes my hair, especially my ends feeling soft and looking healthy! #contest
Keeps my hair smooth and smells wonderful. I got it in a sample box a while ago and got the small size to keep with me when I travel! It's great for days I just wanna refresh my look. #contest

Probably should have read the fine print before trying this. I'm looking for a holy grail to give my ultra-fine pixie cut a sleek, retro look. This isn't it. Looked more like I hadn't washed my hair in too long. Doesn't mean it isn't a great product for the right hair type.. #contest
This keeps my hair nice and smooth! While it is pricey it is worth the money. Not only does it tame my hair but it smells amazing too! #contest

reviews.review_title: The Hairdressers Invisible Oil is amazing
reviews.review_text: I love this entire line from B&B. This oil can be a little heavy, but it's magic in small amounts! If you have thick, course, unruly hair (like mine) this will make your hair so soft and manageable. Combined with the shampoo and conditioner is my favorite combo, if only it wasn't so expensive! #contest
I obsolutely love this product! It works amazing on ur hair i reallly really recommend this product to all my friends
This product is super light and doesn't leave my hair greasy. It's a great hair oil and leaves my hair soft and smelling great. Will definitely buy soon!
This is an amazing product!! I have very flat/straight/fine hair. This product not only works but smells good, too. Keeps my hair looking healthy! #contest
I love this product!!  I have dry, damaged, processed hair and this oil makes my hair feel silky and soft.
I received this as a sample from a hair dresser and I have to say I love it. It's not thick and leaves your hair smelling great. Will buy the larger size soon.
I love this stuff. A little goes a long way. Use too much you look greasy. I will use this until the day I no longer have hair!!! #contest

I have over processed dry hair and I applied a dime sz amount in my hands and applied it to my hair. It made my curls look more healthy, less frizzy and it made my hair shine. I think it was over priced and it had a very subtle scent. I bought it because it made my hair look healthy!

I know the description says it is for specific hair types, but I have fine, wavy-ish hair and it still works great for me! I don't think it is too greasy, as I have read some reviews saying that. I love to use it after I towel dry my hair, before I style! It protects and strengthens your hair as well as helps with frizz. Great product! #contest
I love this oil a friend of mine recommend this to me this product smells so good and works well on my hair.

I have very dry wavy hair and I found this oil to leave my hair a little too greasy. It does a great job of taming frizz though! I think it would be better for somebody with super curly hair though! This post is part of a #contest but all opinions are my own
I have dry hair with a wavy texture and this really helps to moistureize now that I've added color to my hair. Not a bad scent and can be used on dry hair as well. #contest

Love this oil. I use this almost every day in the morning for my dry ends and it makes a huge difference . It smells amazing and make my hair feels softer and looks healthier. Would recommend this to anyone who has dry split ends or color treated hair
This is my number one go to for soft & textured hair. Will continue to but #loveit

I  received this oil as a sample and it was amazing. I have used their blowout serum to and it works amazing  also. I would recommend this over the Moroccan oil because in my opinion it works a lot better!  Definitely worth the back.
I love this. it is very light and doesn't weigh my hair down at all. I usually dont use oils in my hair but I got this as a sample and I fell in love with it!

I received a sample of this product a couple months ago and fell in love! The description says it is for curly hair, but it works wonders on my dry straight hair. I put a little bit of this oil into my hair after the shower (while still damp) and style normally. It leaves my hair moisturized and shiny, but not oily. It also has such a lovely smell, similar to the smell of other professional hair products. I was so pleased with this oil that I knew I needed the full sized version, and have been loving it ever since! Recommend for anyone who is trying to bring back some life to dry hair!
This stuff is seriously a life saver. It smells good, it feels good, and it's simple amazing!

reviews.review_title: A dream for thick, dry hair
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite oils I've ever tried! The smell is intoxicating it's so good. I have thick and typically dry hair, and this works wonders when I put it in before blow drying my hair. It leaves my hair lightweight and shiny. I only gave it 4/5 stars because of the price. Other than that, it is a great product and would definitely recommend it. #contest

Great for on-the-go styling! Tried this even after a busy day and it tamed my flyaway hairs. A little goes a long way and I imagine it will keep hair shiny and soft all day when you use it after a shower! Gives life to highlights. Smells deeply delicious with an undertone of Argan and coconut; had a subtle scent that makes me crave warm weather and hot sand.

This stuff is pricy but very good. This stuff compared to drug store hair oils is really nice because a little goes a long way and it absorsbs really quickly into dry and damaged hair almost healing it. It instantly smooths flyaways, breakage & split ends. Smells great.
This oil smells so good! But I can't use a quarter size drop due to it weighing my hair done and making it suoer greasy l, so I use it on my ends
I love this stuff! It's so great it doesn't leave me hair dry or anything it was totally worth every dollar spent! Definitely going to have to pick some more products up.

Loved this product!!! Tried the in store sample and had to buy it! Made my hair so soft and shiny and didn't weigh it down! I have lightened hair and it tends to get dry and frizzy but this product was amazing!!! #contest

I tried this product when it first came out. I have so many baby hair/fly aways and very brittle hair. My hair also gets greasy very easy. With that being said, this product took care of all that! A little goes a long way. It protects my hair from the heat of my flat iron amd even the suns rays! It doesnt weigh down my hair or cause it to look greasy and it smells so so good! This is my go to product i must always have. #contest
Tried this in the store and absolutely loved it! I have frizzy hair and saw a big difference when I used this product. Also love that it makes my hair soft and shiny! #contest
This is a great product to control frizz without being too oily for your scalp! Smooths and makes your hair shine! #contest

I have coarse and dry hair, and it's naturally curly. When I straighten it with heat styling, it usually looks a little fuzzy after still (and humidity cranks that up). This oil tames the beast so to speak, leaves a beautiful shine and isn't oily looking at all. #contest
Tried this in the store and absolutely loved it! I have super frizzy hair and saw a dramatic difference when I used this product. I also love that it makes my hair soft and shiny! #contest
Amazing love it.. Everyone should try it..
I love this product! I use it for different things. It's worked for everything I've done with my hair and it smells amazing.

I have always been faithful to the chi silk. But this right here is heaven. I was skeptical at first, but I went ahead and bought it. It was either go big or go home. And I fell in love. I have really thick hair as a lot of it and it easily gets oily. But this just made my hair even more beautiful. Love it. #Contest
I love this product! It helps control the frizz in my hair without leaving a residue or oily feeling in my hair. It smooths my hair out and leaves an amazing shine.
I love this oil! It does not make my scalp oily, as other hair serums and oils tend to do. Leaves my wavy hair frizz free and looking healthy.

I have dry curly hair. This just made my hair greasy even when I only used a little. It somehow made my hair greasy and frizzy at the same time which I didn't even think was possible.  I have another hair that I love that makes my hair soft without weighing down my curls or making my hair greasy. I was hoping after all these great reviews, this Bumble and Bumble could be another option since my favorite one isn't available in the US or Europe. Unfortunately, this did nothing good for me.
This product will leave your car with that extra shine you have been looking. and besides everything it won't let ur hair oily like the other ones.

Pros -nice light texture -nice faint smell -helps bring out curls -a little goes a long way  Cons -doesn't work any better than most drugstore serums, and has most of the same ingredients. Unless you specifically love the smell, save your money. It doesn't keep ends hydrated and smooth longer than any drugstore serum.

I recently had my hair bleached and while it did not get excessively damaged, it definitely feels drier than usual. I got this oil as a sample and it made my hair so soft and shiny I had to buy the full size. It's perfect for my dry ends and makes them look healthy and shiny without feeling or looking greasy.

Love all the amazing products from this line and recently started using a different oil. So GLAD I RAN OUT!  I can now go back to this.  If its not broke don't fix it... This oil is a miracle...  I use it on my ends and also a few pumps into my conditioner to create a homemade masque for my hair.  This is the best oil ever... YOU MUST TRY IT!!!!

My hair type: Long, thick hair, colored, dry and damaged ends.  I reallllly wanted to love this. And I don't hate it. But it definitely wasn't worth the price tag for me. I think the ingredients are nice, I do think that it is good for your hair, but it just does not absorb into my hair and just sits there. I have a habit of touching my hair a lot, and every time I touched my hair, I would get slightly oily fingers. At first, I thought I was using too much product, but I have very long thick hair, and I was only using half a pump or one pump at the most. I tried to make it work, but it just wasn't the best product for me. Obviously this is just my personal experience and everyone's hair is different! It definitely didn't weigh my hair down which was nice. I would recommend getting a sample first to test out whether it will work on your hair type!

reviews.review_title: Leaves hair soft and frizz free
reviews.review_text: I love this oil. It leaves my hair frizz free, soft, and weightless. Use sparingly though. I have straight, mid-back length, and fine (but a lot of it) hair and two pumps is perfect for my lengths. Shoulder length and shorter hair might want to only use 1/2 or 1 pump. I bought the full sized bottle and it's lasted me over a year.

For the past year, many hair has been extremely dry, unmanageable, and frizzy. I color it, have highlights, dry it, flatten it... I saw this product awhile back but I didn't wasn't to become attached to yet another expensive product. I tried It's a Ten, smooth criminal, Argon Oil, John Freida, masks, and so on. Finally, I spent 500 at the Rewards Bar on B&B Silkening Set, and last night I used a microdot of the Hairdresser's Oil and BAM... immediately it made my hair shiny and smooth. This is a game changer for me. I am so excited about my beautiful hair!

reviews.review_title: I wish I had this back in middle school!
reviews.review_text: I use this oil as the last step for my hair before going out. In other words, do your shower stuff, any leave-in conditioner or other treatment, then let your hair air dry while you get dressed or do makeup or whatever.   At that point, in my life before knowing about dry oil, I would have done a final spritz of water to reduce frizz and then hairspray to try to keep the curls looking that way (defined).   Now I squirt 3-5 drops of oil into my palms and use my hands to lightly spread it over the hair on one side of my head, moving on to major scrunching from the ends to really work it in (repeat on other side). It's amazing the definition and volume this creates for my fine, white-girl curly hair. I feel like a model with almost no effort. If you see the tiny vials of this product available as free samples with online orders, *Take Them* and you can use them for travel.
Gave this product a couple of uses it did not do anything at all for my hair. Definitely returning.

This product leaves my hair looking so healthy! My hair looks shiny but in a natural way. It eliminated my frizz and fly-aways and just controls excessive unwanted volume, especially in my ends. My hair is bleached and toned, an almost silvery platinum, so it does tend to get dry when tamed with hot tools, but this oil replenishes the moisture leaving it looking healthy. I have received so many compliments on my hair since starting to use this product.
I get highlights every year and now my hair is really damaged. To smooth it out and get the knots out this is the only thing that will get my hair combed out.

I was told that this would work on fine straight hair but that's definitely not true. I wanted to use it to control flyaways and make my hair less frizzy and fuzzy. All it did was make my hair greasy but somehow I still had frizziness and flyaways, just greasy hair on top of that.

I have hair that has been colored, and it became dry and weak. I used a sample,and I was hooked! It made my parched hair soft, shiny, and healthy looking! I have used other oils to attain the softness and shine, but they are often thick and a bit heavy. This is SO NOT HEAVY. After curling or straightening my hair, I add the oil to smooth out the frizz and add shine. Then, my hair, which is black but now red, is soft, shiny, and healthy looking Can't say enough....good stuff!  I have purchased two bottles. One for home and another for travel because I can't be without it.
I love this product. Feels great, nice for thick long hair that usually gets greasy from oil products
Love how it leaves my hair silky. It's great for blondes.

got this as a sample and it works wonders! you don't need a whole lot of it to work either. i have super curly, yet frizzy hair and it really helped tamed it. Got the full size as a gift for christmas and i couldn't be happier. it is a little pricey, but well worth it if you can proportion how much you use wisely.

This stuff is magic for my hair. My hair is very frizzy due to humidity and coloring it often so I use this everyday after blow drying. I've been using this product for over a year now (still on the same bottle - 1 and a half pumps is more than enough for my long hair) and I swear it has made it grow faster and appear much healthier as well.

I got this product as a sample originally. Tried it once and I already knew it was a necessity to add to my collection. I have an addition to products (I even refused to go out once in college because I lost my favorite hair product so I refused to leave the house until I got a new one). I have highlighted hair and it gets very very dry on the ends. I use less than a dime size of this product (so even though it may seem expensive, it will last long) and first focus on my ends then the rest into my hair. My hair is much softer with it and my ends look extremely healthy. I also recently ordered the primer as well, that I can't wait to try.

I don't see the hype. Nothing special for the price. It's an okay hair oil for the ends of your hair but didn't do much for me. I feel like there are a lot of other better hair oils out there for the same price.

i have thick, oily hair and i'm not usually a fan of oils because i feel as if they make my already oily hair much more oily, this product did not, i put a quarter sized amount (since i have so much hair) just on the ends of my hair right after i get out of the shower and it was so easy to brush through my hair and it was soft and manageable!

My hair is fine like a child's and it is hard to grow long because of tangles when wet, it is just too much work. When I first used this product, a small half pump makes my hair shockingly easy to brush out when wet. There was however a slight oilyness that I did not like. Now when I put on the product I rub it in under my top most layer, and not at all into the ends. When I brush out, it just looks perfect and I still don't have to fight all the rats and tangles. Really love this product.

Once you rub this in your hands and it emulsifies, it hydrates hair nicely. I have dry, coarse, curly, color treated hair and it works wonders. But only use a drop or two - too much and it will make your hair feel greasy. Using so little, this small bottle will last a VERY long time.
honestly - the price is crazy, but if you can afford it buy this product or at least try to get a sample. it makes my hair feel so soft and healthy

reviews.review_title: Great for fine dry hair too
reviews.review_text: I received a sample with my beauty insider points. I didn't know this was geared for coarse/thick/hair. So I just started using it in place of my normal heat protectant, and all I can say is WOW! Buying a bottle immediately. This was the first time my long fine hair didn't tangle throughout the whole day! Better than morrocan oil, at least for me!!

reviews.review_title: Fantastic hair oil for wavy, thick hair.
reviews.review_text: This is hands down one of the best products I have ever used for my hair. I have thick, fine, wavy-ish hair which reacts to the humidity in summer and gets brutalized by Canadian winters. I have used this oil for about a year now and I notice a huge difference in my hair; it's very soft and silky after application, and even if I don't use it for a few days my hair still feels healthier because of my continual usage. The smell is quite subtle, and a little goes a long way ( I use only one pump of the bottle for hair that's about 4 inches past collarbone). I like that it comes in two sizes, and I usually buy the smaller bottle because it's cheaper, and lasts me months at a time. Great value for money.
This product was perfect for my messy frizzy hair. I use to straighten my hair every day to get rid of the frizz, now my straightener sits in the corner collecting dust.
This product really worked on my frizzy hair. It is now sleek and shiny.
Frizzy and dry ends from flat iron, etc. we're taken care of without overly greasing my hair. Nice smell and consistency. I'm very happy with it.
Only use on ends it can make hair greasy if you apply too much
Nothing special about this product, made my hair feel dry and gross. Would much rather spend the money on  moroccan oil.

This is the first time since I discovered It's a ten's miracle leave in treatment, that I have found a pre-blow dry conditioner that I couldn't live without...  I first got the sample in my ipsy box, (thank you ipsy!) and was stunned by the results. The full size product is a bit spendy, but one does NOT need much, or you run the risk of the oil slick look, no Bueno. I use it in combination with it's a tens miracle leave in treatment and think it's safe  to say that this combination (for me atleast) is perfect and will never change!

reviews.review_title: great for thick straight hair too
reviews.review_text: I have thick, straight hair and this makes it feel silky and smooth without feeling greasy or weighed down.

I have really frizzy hair & this serum is like magic for my hair. makes it so soft & smooth & the product smells so great, which in turn makes my hair smell lovely! I love this serum so much, I buy a new one every time my bottle runs empty!

Initially when I saw the price of this I just about had a stroke, but because a little of it goes a long way, it lasts for a long time. I've had the larger size bottle for over a year and there's still a lot of product left. After a bleach disaster by an inexperienced hair dresser, this oil honestly saved my hair from being a pile of straw. I use this as well as the Bumble and bumble grooming creme and it works wonders.

reviews.review_title: THIS IS FOR ALL YOU THICK HAIR GIRLS
reviews.review_text: I've gone through 2 sample sizes and 2 big bottles and I love this! I have thick curly hair and it has been a life saver for heat protection, humidity protection (and I live in florida), fly-aways, frizz, and it smells great! You don't need a lot of product (on pump does the trick) and if you're someone with hair that gets oily easily then maybe avoid your roots. This is a great universal product well worth the money!!
Love this! Use it after every shower, and never have a problem with knots, and it helps tame my frizz, making my hair soft and shiny

I wanted to love this product but it is very thick and even though I used a tiny bit, it still gave my hair that greasy feeling. I have fine blond hair and perhaps this is not the product for my hair.
I have naturally thick, curly and frizzy hair. I've tried lots of other hair oils and this one is perfectly light weight!! It is perfect for a finishing touch after using heat tools. Love it.

My hair is thick, below shoulder length and dry..I have tried more products than I can remember to get my hair smooth , shiny and frizz free..Living in FL has given me quite the challenge and I have finally found a product that works!!! One and a half pumps is plenty for me and my hair is smooth and shinier than its been in a long time..applied to damp hair prior to blowdrying has given my hair new life..I couldn't be happier with my hair and wish I tried it earlier.

Received a sample and instantly fell in love. My straight, thin hair was feeling damaged and dry; this product provided an immediate difference without weight. My hair is smoother and doesn't tangle during the day. I use a small amount of product on the ends of my hair before blow drying. Will definitely purchase in the near future!

I have very thick, coarse, wavy curly hair that has been colored regularly going on 15 years. I like to blow it out straight but it can be a dry, frizzy mess especially on the ends.  I recently bought this oil and am very happy with it. 3 a 4 pumps is all I need for my just past my shoulder length hair. It adds the perfect amount of moisture, not greasy at all, and completely smooths my hair to a perfect blow out.  Once I finish my blowout I rub one more pump in my hands and concentrate applying to the ends and voila!  It's a miracle oil!
A little goes a long way with this oil. I have long fine straight hair that gets knotted frequently. I use this before I blow dry my hair and it makes my hair very shiny smooth.

Keeps my hair healthy by only applying it 2 or 3 times a week. I forgot about split ends since I started using it. I will repurchase again and again.  The only con is the coconut smell, but it just personal taste. Still won 5 stars
I have thick, curly, dry hair. Certain oils immediately look oily or some don't tone the frizz down enough. This stuff is the perfect oil for my hair! I use it for all my hair styles that I use.

Hands down best hair oil I've used. I don't like purchasing oils because I honestly think coconut oil is the best for moisturizing your hair but my hair dresser used this on my hair after putting bleach in it and it never felt dry! Definitely recommend if you are looking for an oil that will keep your hair soft and moisturized!

I purchased the full size and I know it's expensive but it's worth it! I use 2-4 pumps after combing my wet hair and after curling/straightening my hair. I apply it to where my ears are if you know what I mean to my ends and it makes my hair so soft and shinny omg I live for this stuff. Thank you GiGi Gorgeous!

I had this first as a sample and it was awesome for smoothing and protecting my natural color. However, after going blonde this was just not enough protection. Recommend sticking with your leave-in conditioner if your hair has been color treated.

I have typical Asian hair that is pretty strong, however when my hair passes certain length, the ends start to get tangled easily and get a bit too dry. So this product is really light weight to be applied to the ends of the hair and prevents tangles. The scent of the product is really sweet and makes my hair smells great.

I've been looking for something to tame my coarse, thick, frizzy hair and this is it. When I wash my hair, I don't even have to use that much product. It allows me to air dry my hair and now I just have curls and no frizz. It's a miracle.

This oil helps to fight frizz and does provide much needed moisture. I still need frizz ease when the air is extremely humid, but this works as a stand alone when it is not that hot. Love the weight and feel of this.

I used this for the first time after a coworker gave me some she had left overu2014I was amazed at how well it detangled my thick, colour-treated hair.  I don't use a lot of product in my hair because I don't like it to feel greasy or heavy. This is often the only product I need to tame frizz and detangle.  I don't like spending a lot on hair products but this bottle also goes a REALLY long way. I have thick, medium/long hair and one of these little bottles lasted me about a year and a half. Two to three pumps are all I need.

This is the only hair oil that doesn't make my skin break out. It's also AMAZING! I have purchased bottle after bottle of this. It's pricey but worth it. I use 5 pumps in my thick long hair and it makes it completely frizz free and silky.
I received a sample of this in my BirchBox and I was quick to buy a full sized product! I put a tiny amount on dry hair and it makes my hair shiny and silky. I love this stuff!

This stuff is seriously good. I have fine, curly, high porosity hair and this did wonders for me. Did not weigh my hair down at all but my curls looked so defined and moisturizer after applying. 10/10

I love a hair oil, and have tried & enjoyed many, but this is by far the best. It is well worth the money - lasts a long time, smells amazing, makes hair so soft, doesn't weigh hair down. My can't live without hair product
Love this hair oil.  I have very fine hair and this oil does not weigh it down.

I've been using this for a few months and have decided that it's the best hair product I've ever tried. I have medium-long thick hair, and I use 1.5-2 pumps of this when my hair is damp after a shower. It makes my hair so much softer and smoother than I've ever consistently had it. The most impressive thing is that, I've noticed my hair stays soft and is less frizzy even on days that I haven't used it! So it's improving the look and feel of my hair overall, which I'm so impressed by. I get the feeling that a bottle will last me a year or so, so even though I initially balked at the price, it's so totally worth it. I hope they make this forever!
I love this oil. I got it as a sample & I  going to buy the full size. It made my damaged long hair soft & smooth.
This is the most amazing hair serum ever for curly hair! Highly recommended!! My hair feels so soft but not greasy
I have tried lots and lots of oils and this one is the best I've ever tried. Does not leave your hair greasy if you use too much. Keeps my hair very soft and I have course hair.
Loved the light scent to this oil, felt great in my hair. Did not notice any type of striaghting with this but did keep my hair frizz free. Kind of pricey for a hair oil though.
A+ I love that a little goes a long way !! Doesn't make my hair greasy and smells amazing !

This is by far the best product I have ever used for getting rid of frizz. It also holds up well between washes and does not make my hair greasy. I did not think this did much for adding shine, but that is not what I bought it for. Overall very happy with this product.

I recently ran out of my favorite hair oil from a different company and was in the market for a new one. I tried a sample of this one and fell in love. It makes my hair super soft (even where I bleached my hair) and doesn't weigh down my thin wavy hair. It has a really light scent that is barely noticeable. A little goes a long way for me.

This stuff is holy grail/can't live without/ride or die, however you say it, basically I will not travel without it. I blow dry my hair almost every time I wash it and with just 3 pumps this handles my frizz and smoothes me out without taking my volume (very important in the south). Not to mention this bottle has lasted me over a year. I have nothing bad to say, and to those who are saying it doesn't work well for curly hair I understand because I have yet to find an oil that I can wear that doesn't effect my natural curls. But I can still get a great curling iron curl with this stuff.

I have long black hair, naturally wavy but not the pretty wavy, all the way down my back.  I usually use asian products on my hair but decided to try this product because of the reviews.  It has proved to be all it claims.  It definitely tames both my fly aways and waviness.  I apply just a little bit to my damp hair, dry it or iron it and then apply a little bit more after it's dry.  It smells great and makes my hair shiny and smooth.  LOVE IT!

This stuff is good, it does the job when I straighten my hair. I have fine, naturally curly hair and I do not use this product if I just want to go with my natural curls. It doesn't help with my frizz. However when I flat iron my hair, this is a go to! It doesn't weigh my hair down but I also only apply to the bottom half of my hair. I blow dry my hair about 80-90% then use this and finish drying my hair, then I flatiron. My hair is silky smooth!! However I don't recommend relying on this for frizz free, natural curls
I think this product is great and makes my hair nice and smooth!  The only problem I have is that sometimes it makes my hair feel too oily and I think it is way too expensive

I don't know if I'm not using this product correctly or something's wrong with it. When I bought it I put a bit of it on damp hair and blow dried it. The oil was not absorbed and I was left with greasy strands! I had to rewash my hair again. Horrible.   I don't understand why does it have such a high price either.   All of Bumble and Bumble products I have tried turned out to be terrible, I'm done giving them chances.

Great product for styling hair! I work it into my hair before blow drying and found a noticeable difference.  My hair even seems to have i proved overtime, split ends are looking better, and it doesn't weigh my hair down to use.

Really loved the oil, I would add it to my hair after showering when its damp and then comb it through and let it air dry and noticed a big difference for my curly hair. It helps to tame the frizzies in my area where its humid. The only problem is Bumble and Bumble decided to remove the smaller oz bottle which was great for travel as there's restrictions for travelling liquids in my carry on. Now im not able to bring it as there's no smaller bottle options. Disappointed the smaller bottle was been discontinued. Otherwise I would give 5 stars.
Works like a dream! Smells amazing and makes my hair soft and smooth. It's amazing and I love it!

I have severely dry, damaged, brittle hair. The only way I can get it smooth is by blow drying and using the flat iron. I got a sample of this and immediately after the first use, I ordered more. It makes my hair so smooth soft and shiny. And don't need to use any heat tools at all. Even my husband noticed a difference right away.

Love love love. I have thick, wavy, frizzy hair. This keeps the frizz away and gives my red hair a beautiful shine without looking oily. Makes my waves soft and can let my hair dry naturally with this product. Love

reviews.review_title: So happy I tried this oil!
reviews.review_text: I was curious how this hair oil would work and first got it as a sample. I was very surprised at what a difference it made almost immediately when I tried it! It gives a natural and healthy shine, it truly smoothed any errant hair into place, there was no flatness, and no heaviness or hint of oiliness! Pretty amazing! I have purchased a bottle and passed the remainder of the sample to a niece who also loved the product. I plan to keep this invisible oil as part of my hair care essentials. Thank you.

I have finer hair and noticed oils (even Orbie) don't live up to the awesome expectations I have for them. Partly, due to my hair texture and shape. I'm trying to grown my hair back out and rid it of past highlights, so I have this oil a try and wow! It's very light, and absorbs into the hair. It doesn't make my hair stringy or greasy and I can tell it is soft and shiny. I enjoy that I feel like this product treats my hair. I use it with the primer, which I can't say enough positive things about.

I have fine hair and pretty much any product makes my hair sad and flat.  Recently, I started having fly always and my hair was beginning to feel dry from summer ocean water so I started the search for anything that might help.   After too much money spent on products and time searching I decided to give this oil a try.   Needless to say, I am amazed and will definitely re buy. You barely need any (I use one full squirt daily), and it doesn't weight my hair down or make it greasy. It really is invisible. Sooooo happy!!

I have wavy/ curly hi lighted blonde hair that I blow dry and straighten daily so my hair isn't in the best shape. The humidity kills my hair. This is the first product that I have found that keeps it soft and manageable and smooth in the 40plus humidex. And it smells awesome. I've recommended this to everyone I know since I got it 6 weeks ago. Love it!!

this stuff is great if you have hair that needs to be tamed a little bit.  it's very light and truly invisible.  i think i like the argon oil better for really taming my frizzyness, but this is second best.  i do a couple pumps on wet hair and then comb through.  it doesn't work as well on dry hair.

I had my long, dark hair balayage twice for the first time...bad idea. Due to the damage, my hair was constantly tangled, dry, and have been breaking off like crazy! I have never in my life, purchased so many other products to help with the damage.This product is expensive. It took me a while to make the decision to buy. After reading the reviews, and it's claims...I am so glad I did! My hair has been saved! I use this in my hair after letting my hair air dry. I brush my hair, put it in a ponytail and apply it onto the ends. My hair feels less dry, breaks less, and does not tangle as much as it did before.
Smooths fly-always, adds shine, decreases coarseness.
No grease tames flyaway a & frizz fairly well. Good for fine hair

Love the smell of this product. It is light and doesn't leave my hair greasy. It doesn't quite tame the frizz in such a humid environment but I do love the way it makes my hair feel. It is a little costly but does do a long way.

I've used a lot of hair products hoping they'll tame my frizzy and thick hair after I get out of the shower. Some of them were too greasy, some of them were really smooth but did nothing to my hair, and some of them smelled way too strong. This product doesn't get rid of my frizzy hair completely. I still have to use a straightening iron. But my hair feels way lighter and smoother if I just use one pump before drying and one pump before straightening. I love it! It goes on light and it stays on. My hair doesn't feel greasy and it doesn't smell too strong at all. Will definitely buy this instead of all those argan oils.
Great! Leaves hair looking healthy, but don't over do it. Little goes a long way

I've tried all the oils.....aragon, coconut, macadamia (you get the picture) and each time I was left with a meh, okay,  my hair is borderline-greaseball.  Until one precious morning when I stumbled upon this bottle of awesomeness.  I add this to my dried out ends by first pumping and evenly distributing the product on my hand.  This product does not weigh my hair down and gives me luxurious locks... If this was a milkshake it would be bringing all the boys to the yard (mandatory and cliche flashback to the early 2000s, check).  Piece out ya'll
My hair is so frizz free when i put this on dry hair but it will be very oily if i use it on wet or damp hair amazing smell though

I used on wet hair post-shower throughout all my hair, and then air-dried my hair, and while it was nice the first day my hair looked wicked oily the second day. Next time I'll use on just my ends, since it's too oily to use near my scalp.
This is awesome and doesn't leave your hair super oily like other oil protector products

Truly makes my hair feel soft and look shiny not greasy. I have fine hair but LOTS of it so its huge and wavy but just made up of many fine hairs. I can use this on damp or dry hair and it instantly softens. I love the way this works but I'm not a huge fan of the ingredients. Ugh I don't stop buying it though because it works so well..

I have thick wavy hair and it will get poofy when it dries. As a college student, I don't have much time to straighten my hair. So as an alternative, I use this oil. Its very lightweight smells nice too, my hair feels soft and I don't look like a freaking lion after blow dry. The only downside of this oil is that the pump is kinda stupid and cheap. Mine won't work I had to twist the cap every time I want to use it. And for $40 hair product, it should come with nice bottle and pump right? I would definitely repurchase this and hopefully they will repacking this oil into nice high end looking bottle.
It is the best hair oil I ever tried. It doesn't make my hair greasy, it smells great and it adds a lot of shine to my long hair! Perfect if you have very long hair with damages ends.

My hair is very thick, curly/ wavey and corse. I have tried everything to try to get a soft manageable texture to my hair. This oil is amazing. Easy to reach all of my hair (not just the top layer). My hair has never felt or looked better. Even saved me at the beach where the dry salty air turns my hair into a matted mess. On my 3rd bottle and never looking back.

This is an amazing hair serum. It leaves my hair effortlessly soft and silky, without weighing it down. You don't need much product so it lasts forever! Leaves your hands nice and moisturized as well, I don't even wash them after using!

Although it's pricey, it's a must have. I use it on my damp hair after every wash. It smells amazing and tames my wavy hair so I can allow it to naturally dry and it gives a nice soft wave. My hair looks healthy and shiny and has helped with split ends. Be careful on dry hair because if you use too much, it won't be so invisible!

I love the way this product smells, it's a good balance of moisture without making my hair too greasy. My hair is prone to grease. I've yet to find a hair oil that's as long lasting as I would really like but it's decent enough.

I got the sample size of this and at first I didn't use it because a lot of oils don't work well with my hair. This was a completely different story! It did exactly what it claimed aaaaad smells SO good! Went ahead and bought the full size.
Did absolutely nothing for my hair. Had to return.
I have really thick, straight, long hair and this oil which I only use on my ends since my scalp gets really oily quickly, is fantastic!

reviews.review_title: if you have curly/frizzy hair you need this.
reviews.review_text: This is by far the best product I have used to tame frizz and straighten my hair. It smells great and works great. I've used it with and without the shampoo and conditioner. It's magic!

I love this hair oil. I have long, dry, color-treated, curly hair, and this product keeps my ends looking healthy. Unlike some hair oils, it doesn't leave your hair feeling greasy.I actually use it on top of my head, too, to keep all of my little wispy hairs in check -- probably not recommended if your hair gets greasy easily, but it works for me. AND it's paraben-free and is lighter on fragrance, so I'm not allergic to it!

Better then any hair oil I have ever tried and I have tried lots!!!  I use this in my hair everytime I get out of the shower. My hair is soft and shiny after it dries. Love this stuff. Will be buying it again as my go to hair oil.

I bought this by mistake. I was looking for the B&B hair primer. I was in a rush and bought this one. I was going to return it but decided to try it out. I have very curly hair and used it for straightening my hair. It works great. Makes my hair silky and smooth which isn't easy to do because my hair is extremely curly. Love this product. So happy I goofed.

Hesitated to buy because of the price,  but it's so worth it! I'm a beauty product junky,  and love trying new things,  but my hair is fine and doesn't respond well to oils usually.  Dry shampoo and only 1 type of heat styling every other day gets me to 4th day hair- this product makes it look even healthier throughout a blowout's tenure, and reduces the frizziness that comes after drying in humidity! Highly recommend!!

Not a huge B&B fan, but after reading all the reviews, I had to try it. So glad I did! I love it. Smells wonderful and it makes my super fine hair soft and smooth without weighing it down. I highly recommend!

This product is great, my hair is softer, less dead/split ends, and way less frizz! Recommend 2 pumps for long thick hair after letting your hair towel dry for a bit and before blow drying! Also great on dry hair (even blonde) with a tiny tiny drop to manage frizz

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_text: I have curly medium-length hair and use this oil to help with my dry ends and all-over frizz. I only need 2-3 pump on damp hair, any more and it gets greasy, thus it lasts me 4-6 months. It smells great and is super lightweight.

I've used a lot of different hair oils.  This one is by far the best. It tames frizz without weighing down hair or making it greasy.  I use it whether I'm blow drying my hair, air drying it, or curling it.  It's perfect for any hairstyle.

I got the set that they were giving out as samples not too long ago, with this oil and the shampoo and the conditioner. Let me tell you, I have never had a hair product change my hair so much in just one use. My hair is soft and shiny and touchable. It's easy to work with and it is normally such a pain.   I have very thick, frizzy, wavy/curly hair that reacts badly to anything. My hair basically has the attitude of a teenage girl. The Invisible Oil line has changed that. I cannot wait to get full sizes and use these on a regular basis.

reviews.review_title: dry, color treated, heat styled hair
reviews.review_text: I know I abuse my hair. I bleach it, blow dry, and curl on a regular basis. I only shampoo twice a week max and deep condition regularly. I find in between shampoos, my roots will get a little oily and my ends get very dry. I use dry shampoo in my roots and always add oil to my ends before styling. Some oils leave greasy residue on my hair, this one absorbs right in, and leaves my hair soft and shiny, full of volume. My hair always looks shiny and freshly washed with this, even if it is on day 4! It's pricy but if you abuse your hair like me, you gotta pay up. Definitely try this oil!

This is the only smoother my thick head of FINE, curly light brown hair likes.  Not heavy at all, but smoothes better than ANY anti-frizz I've ever tried.  Can be layered multiple times in the day, or day after day without accumulating.
My stylist uses this on my hair when I get my haircut and I must say, it leaves my hair soft everytime I use it. I bought it to use on special occasion days. A little bit goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: WONDERFUL. A little dab'll do ya
reviews.review_text: This product is wondeful. It does seem pricey, but you use such a tiny bit that it will last a very long time. I love it.

I was really hoping to like this product but it does absolutely nothing for my hair. I've tried putting a little,I've tried putting a lot.. I also tried wet hair and dry hair and NOTHING. Feels like a huge waste of money. im really disappointed.  :(
I tried this to tame my little flyaways but It didn't really help. I decided to return it because of that.
This stuff is pretty good! It is light weight and a little goes a long way. It also smells great too! This should last quite awhile.

I have thin hair but a lot of it, so it can often act more like thick hair. It is on the dry side as I've had my hair from platinum blonde to pink to dark brunette. I'm so happy that I got this and gave it a try! Usually oils I use either make my hair stringy and greasy looking or they don't give any shine at all. This oil is perfect! I use it on damp hair and then again just a bit once I've dried my hair, to give it that ultra polished, straight from the salon look. I can't say enough about this product it is truly my holy grail! If I was going to a desert island, and could only bring ONE item, this would be the item I'd bring! It has a way of making your hair look healthy and shiny without looking like its shiny because of a product. AMAZING. I purchased the small bottle just so I can take it on trips with me. The holy grail of hair products for shine and looks (plus heat protection and sun!)

At first I was hesitant to buy this, given the hefty price tag and the small quantity. I have very long, straight, thick hair with balayage, so I was looking for something to protect and nourish it. Honestly, I really love this oil! I noticed more shine and softness when I use it on towel-dried hair, and my ends are always nourished, whereas they were really dry feeling prior to buying this. The bottle lasts a long time too : I only need one pump (which is very small) for my waist length hair. Definitely better than other similar oils I've tried in the past.  Would recommend for people with a similar hair type.

Honestly the positive reviews of this product is crazy. I was told at Sephora that it only comes in a larger size, which isn't that large to begin with and at $40 it should do magic tricks. Unfortunately this oil is nothing special. Sure it works fine but you can find tons of light weight hair oils anywhere and save money. I'm stuck trying to finish the bottle. Regrets!

I love this oil..my ends are parched and this really does the trick and helps with the frayed look my ends can have sometimes. It adds really beautiful shine, plus the smell is INCREDIBLE. You really only need a small, pea sized amount (I have fine, long hair) - if you use too much and don't distribute it well it can grease up your hair in certain spots...but once you get used to it and figure out how much you need, you're on your way to incredible smelling, shiny and soft hair!

Received a small sample - love it. I have colour-treated hair and do much styling with heat-tools. I have used a lot of products, but this really quenches the dryness without making my hair greasy. As noted in another review, I also wash once a week and rely on dry shampoo/styling touch-ups in between.. This oil does not build up or weigh down my hair. I plan to purchase a full size. I agree, it seems expensive - but my tiny glass-tube sample is only half used after three weeks (don't need much at a time).

I originally rec'd this as a sample in the Bumble & Bumble 500pt reward and I immediately fell in love with it.  I have bleached hair that I am always dying different colors (blues, greens, etc) and my hair can look really dry, dull and frizzy.  With just a tiny amount of this oil my hair is soft, shiny and silky.  There is also a very light, pleasant smell.  The only reason I don't give it 5 stars is because of the price.  Once my sample ran out I decided to bite the bullet and purchase a bottle. Since you don't need to use much it is lasting me a long time.  I would purchase this product again.

I have very thick, curly and frizzy hair that is colored. I wash my hair once/week (I use dry shampoo other days) and I straighten my hair every day (well - I straighten it after washing, but then I re-touch every day). My hair usually looks pretty messy in the morning, and I have a hard time with straightening it.  This oil literally changed my life!  Think the smoothness and the shine of the freshly done salon-hair! That is what you get with only 2 pumps of this oil on the wet towel-dried hair. I took a chance and purchased this thinking - here goes nothing, as nothing really helped in the past to control the frizz. But this is a miracle for my type of hair. I am planning to buy another little bottle shortly just to stock up as I never want to run out of this thing again.  My 11 year old also used it (only one pump on her long and frizzy curly hair) and her hair is noticeably smoother and easier to handle.  I am seriously in love with this product and it the best $50 I spent in a long time!

I had the worst dandruff and once I started using this after about a week I was dandruff free. I love how light it is and it makes my hair look healthy with a very nice non-greasy finish. I have short curly hair that is very dense and frizzy when dry and this makes it very hydrated and easy to style with a blowdryer/brush. Definitely worth the price. I will never use head and shoulders again!

After hearing from Dennis Stokely about this product and then /reading Dennis Stokely's  post about curly hair on  my blog on how fabulous it is for curly girls,  I had to try this. Wow. Love it! I need to buy more but I found that a lot of Bumble & bumble products work for curly hair and I love them (some more than others) .. This one is top notch. Does a great job as primer and I spray it into my hand when I am cocktailing B&b defining curls cream too I am a curly girl with fine, color-treated hair.
I have coarse thick hair that always has flyaways and rough texture.  This makes my hair soft and manageable but still having plenty of volume.

I have frizzy/curly thick chin-length hair and wash my hair at night. I apply a pump of this oil to my hair in the morning to get it to behave, and it sleeks and smoothes my hair into a perfect shine every morning. Super easy + minimal scent + no hair dryer required = amazing!

I got a Bumble to Bumble sample from my 500 points gift. My hair is curly and coarse and I used the blow dry creme and then this hair dresser oil when using the straightening iron and my hair has never looked better! I highly recommend this if you have thick, wavy, coarse hair. I went out and bought the full size after I ran out of the sample. SO WORTH IT!

I have naturally dry, wavy/crazy hair. No matter what I buy, or what I do, it always ends up looking a little brittle at the ends and gets frizzy easily. I searched for a while before purchasing this oil until I finally got a sample from Sephora. Holy *#$&. This has genuinely TRANSFORMED my hair - after 1 use. I've never had hair like this before in my life! It's soft, full of body, shiny, moisturized..this is the holy grail of hair products. What's $40 when you get this kind of hair?! BUY IT!!

I have been using this product since October, and I haven't noticed a difference in my hair at all. My hair is thick, frizzy, coarse, and chemically treated. It does not make my hair smooth, silky, or reduce frizz like the product claims to. I have used almost five pumps before to see if I just wasn't using enough, but it still made no difference.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this with a purchase of a straightener.  I absolutely love that a dime-size will do (I have thick oriental hair).  And if you put it on after washing your hair, it detangles and blow dries fabulously!

My hair is crazy damaged. I'm talking multiple split ends on a single strand damaged. For complicated reasons I have to wait to get a hair cut so I bought this to tide me over and I'm really glad I did. My hair is very fine so I put most of it one while my hair is wet which is honestly enough and makes my hair look and feel 100x better. I also put the tiniest bit on after my hair is dry to add a little shine. Fine haired ladies know shine products are a no go. But this stuff works! I'll definitely be repurchasing.

I have thin naturally curly hair. This is the only oil that doesn't weigh my hair down. I only use a tiny pea size amount so  the bottle should last me a year. I was a bit shocked when I saw the size of the bottle considering what I paid. The best method for my hair is to start in the middle and work my way down, then rub whatever is left on my hands on my roots. It calms the frizz down, leaves my hair with a nice shine, and tangle free.

I have thick, dry, hair with lots of curly texture.  This actually makes my hair look frizzier, especially on humid days. I was expecting better results at this price point. On drier days, it's ok, but nothing that I couldn't get at a fraction of the cost.
I have fine hair and most oils are way too heavy. One pump on damp hair is perfect. Less frizz and nice shine.
Miracle product to combat dry and frizzy hair without feeing oily.  Truly amazing and one of the best product I hv ever used.

reviews.review_title: Brings shine and glossiness to your hair
reviews.review_text: I use this (4 pumps) after towel drying my hair and applying the B&B Invisible Oil Primer all over my hair. I also apply the oil after blow drying (2 pumps) and curling/straightening my hair to tame fly-aways and add the final layer of gloss/shine to my hair   I am told my hair is thick and that I have a lot of it by every hairdresser and over the years my hair has become drier with the coloring and applying heat to style my hair.  This oil has helped with keeping my hair from getting tangled throughout the day (use in conjunction with the Invisibile Oil Primer) and makes my hair look shiny and healthy. You don't need a lot or you will have oily patches in your hair, so experiment with how much you need.  Make sure to evenly distribute the oil throughout your hair and stay away from the roots if you have oily scalp/hair.  I love that this doesn't weigh my hair down at all!

I love this hair product. It leaves my hair shiny and not greasy at all. I get lots of compliments of the shine in my hair. My secret is I put a very small amount in my hair while it is still damp and let it air dry. The next morning I flat iron my hair and it is good to go, I do not need to add any more product.

I am the addicted to using this stuff right after I wash my hair. My hair is natural coarse Italian hair and I have a lot of it. This stuff smells great and helps my dry ends a lot. Also helps when I am braiding my hair, and corn rolling it.
This stuff is sooo expensive. I do like it but not worth the price. I feel like I could find something similar for a fraction of the cost.
Love just use a little bit

This hair oil does exactly what it says! Just one small pump is enough to significantly soften your hair and tame crazy frizz. Works well on my thin hair without weighing it down or making it too oily. Incorporates well into damp hair before styling.

This hair oil is amazing. It makes my dry, thin hair feel super soft. I have curly hair (not super tight, but still curly and frizzy) and I can almost just put this in and nothing else. It feels amazing! It also works wonders when I straighten my hair. I can't say enough good things about this product!

So I have very thick, luscious Italian girl hair that has also been heavily color treated and experimented with for over nearly 15 years with no breaks. This means my hair is always super puffy, lots of fly aways. Italian girl hair also means if I try to just use a little coconut oil to calm it down my hair gets SUPER greasy and ratty looking FAST. Luckily I traded on VIB points for a deluxe Bumble and Bumble sample set that included this and my life hasn't been the same sense. Just a little squirt of this worked through my hair and I can't believe how irresistibly smooth and sleek it is. I'm honestly running my fingers through it right now in awe. I never knew my hair could look like this without a straightener. Will definitely invest in the big bottle!

reviews.review_title: didn't work for my thin hair
reviews.review_text: I tried this a bunch of different ways and was never really happy with the results. Although I really like the consistency and smell of this oil, it just doesn't fit with my hair type. I have thin, long, untreated hair that's already pretty soft and 9 times out of 10 I need to put some sort of volumizer in it to get any sort of life. This oil, though didn't weigh my hair down at all, always ended up making my hair stringy and separated and TOO soft and limp. I'll be returning this one. The primer works much better for me.

reviews.review_title: Long, Dry, Bleached and Colour Treated
reviews.review_text: I have a lot of long, fine tangly hair. This product with the invisible oil primer and repair blow dry have returned my hair to its former texture! I used to very dark brown hair that had red and dark brown dyes layered over one another. Last year I went platinum and have kept a bleach out since then while experimenting with brights and pastels. My former rats nest is smooth, soft and shiny thanks to this oil. I use two pumps which is about 1/4 of what I use with other brands. Its expensive but a little goes a long way!

Pricey but SO so worth it! The shine, the hydration, WOW! I have bleached-platinum, curly hair that's incredibly damaged and porous, but after just one use of this stuff, you wouldn't know it. It's lightweight so it seems like it could be used on any hair texture. Would definitely recommend if you're looking for shine without the stickyness.

Really hesitated buying this because it's quite pricey but I'm definitely glad I did! My hair is oily at the roots but really dry and frizzy everywhere else and this oil does such a great job of absolutely eliminating the frizz without making it oily. It makes my hair shiny, it smells good, and it has surprisingly really improved the health of my hair. I wasn't able to leave it to air dry before because it would get so frizzy, but now I just put on some of this oil when it's damp, scrunch a little to accentuate my natural wave and it air dried soooo beautifully. I've never used anything so versatile! Also great when you just want to blow your hair out. If you can only buy one thing for your hair, PLEASE do yourself a favour and let it be this!

This is AMAZING! I was thinking of not buying this because of the price but I understand why it cost so much. Because it WORKS. I bought this because I recently bleached my hair TWICE, toned it once, and dyed it FOUR time! That is 8 bunches of stuff in my hair in a short period of time! My hair was, indeed, messed up. The ends of my hair was dry - like, it looked like the can break off at any moment.  As you can see from my video, my hair looks sooooooo HEALTHY! You should def save up and buy!  My review for this product starts at 10:20!

I received a sample from a sample bag a while ago. I wasn't too sure of it because I have super frizzy, long hair and no products ever worked...until I tried this! It is AMAZING! It is a light oil and really helps defrizz my hair. A little goes a long way! I only use a tiny bit for my hair. For the price, it is kind of expensive but I would say it's worth it because of how many uses you can get from it. Will purchase once my sample is done!

My hair is very unruly and does not appreciate being combed ever but with this oil brushing is so much easier. The product immediately smoothens hair and quickly gets all the tangles out of my hair. It tames hair great. Also the smell is nice as well which is always a plus! For this product I only use one pump on hair for either side you really do not need to use a lot! Less is more for this product.

I have long black hair, which is why I bought this product to give it a shine and for my tangles. I only put a dime size on my damp hair and went to bed. The next morning I woke up looking like I didn't even wash it the night before... So oily. I will try it again maybe I will use less and try it on dry hair this time. So far not impressed at all!
I love this oil, my hair are soft and bright after every usage. I bought it after the free sample.
Love this product... it works wonders after i blow dry my hair.

I used to work at a hair salon that carted Bb products. I got a 50% discount, so I basically tried the whole line. ALL of the Invisible Oil stuff was the only stuff I liked. Not just liked, loved actually. Now, I use a Wen formula that Sephora doesn't carry (pssst, carry the Mandarin rise formula please, Sephora, thank you), but sometimes I feel like I need to get that shampooed, squeaky clean feeling, and that's when I break out the Invisible Oil line. It's still moisturizing enough, and leaves my hair silky and helps prevent the split ends.
I have fine hair and if 2 much product is used, hair looks oily. Only takes a little!

I've tried all of the b&b hairdresser's invisible oil products, and they're all amazing. If I had to pick one product out of that line that I could not live without, it would be this oil. So lightweight, does not make my hair greasy at all, even with my oily hair. Makes my hair so soft and shiny, and only requires a very small amount so lasts a long time. Very worth the purchase.

I really enjoy the smell of this product and wish it worked for my hair. My hair is straight and the strands are pretty normal in thickness. I would apply this after a shower and I noticed when it dried that my strands would be clumped. Almost as if my hair wasn't fully dry, except that it was fully dry. I just didn't like the clumpy thing so I stopped using it.
I have dry, thick hair that is kind of wavy and tends to frizz. I'm giving this two stars because this product is expensive although it's on par with products that are less than half the price.
Can't leave without it

I clicked on the first size option without really paying attention. Wow- the other reviewers weren't kidding...the bottle was ridiculously tiny! So far I'm not noticing a lot of difference from some less expensive alternatives on the market. Wasn't really expecting some kind of miracle formula, but this is exceptionally AVERAGE.

I had left a very good review for the Josie Maran Hair Serum product, and thought I had found my holy grail for hair serums.  I was mistaken. I'm not saying that the Josie Maran one isn't good. It's fantastic actually. The biggest feature that has me switching to BB Invisible Oil, is that I can go four-five days before a wash (and 2-3 sweaty gym sessions), before I must wash because I look like a grease ball. With JM serum, I could go at max 3 days before a wash.  I would recommend this product to people who like a lot of movement and don't want their hair products to weight it down. Keep in mind you must use very little (you'll think that's not nearly enough product when you pump the tiny bit into your hand), because once you warm it up in your hands, it spreads through your hair brilliantly and offers a great amount of protection for us flat iron girls.  My hair is shoulder length, thick, course, dark brown (basically East Indian hair), but I have had it Japanese straightened (in July 2015).   I feel like this bottle, will last me an entire year, since I'm not washing my hair as often and I use such a little bit.

I've tried all of the b&b hairdresser's invisible oil products, and they're all amazing. If I had to pick one product out of that line that I could not live without, it would be this oil. So lightweight, does not make my hair greasy at all, even with my oily hair. Makes my hair so soft and shiny, and only requires a very small amount so lasts a long time. Very worth the purchase.

I really enjoy the smell of this product and wish it worked for my hair. My hair is straight and the strands are pretty normal in thickness. I would apply this after a shower and I noticed when it dried that my strands would be clumped. Almost as if my hair wasn't fully dry, except that it was fully dry. I just didn't like the clumpy thing so I stopped using it.
I have dry, thick hair that is kind of wavy and tends to frizz. I'm giving this two stars because this product is expensive although it's on par with products that are less than half the price.
Can't leave without it

I clicked on the first size option without really paying attention. Wow- the other reviewers weren't kidding...the bottle was ridiculously tiny! So far I'm not noticing a lot of difference from some less expensive alternatives on the market. Wasn't really expecting some kind of miracle formula, but this is exceptionally AVERAGE.

I had left a very good review for the Josie Maran Hair Serum product, and thought I had found my holy grail for hair serums.  I was mistaken. I'm not saying that the Josie Maran one isn't good. It's fantastic actually. The biggest feature that has me switching to BB Invisible Oil, is that I can go four-five days before a wash (and 2-3 sweaty gym sessions), before I must wash because I look like a grease ball. With JM serum, I could go at max 3 days before a wash.  I would recommend this product to people who like a lot of movement and don't want their hair products to weight it down. Keep in mind you must use very little (you'll think that's not nearly enough product when you pump the tiny bit into your hand), because once you warm it up in your hands, it spreads through your hair brilliantly and offers a great amount of protection for us flat iron girls.  My hair is shoulder length, thick, course, dark brown (basically East Indian hair), but I have had it Japanese straightened (in July 2015).   I feel like this bottle, will last me an entire year, since I'm not washing my hair as often and I use such a little bit.

I've tried all of the b&b hairdresser's invisible oil products, and they're all amazing. If I had to pick one product out of that line that I could not live without, it would be this oil.
